[('1531113180197429248', '@ArylonLovire but what if the neighbourhood parents buy their kids an AR-15, shouldnt my kids also have it for self defense? so they arent taken by surprise?
im being sarcastic of course, its...depressing :/', 'ArraythNochagi|839075242614140929', '2022-05-30T03:20:03.000Z'), ('1531098524292722688', "YOU KNOW; MAYBE LIKE, YOU DON'T NEED AN AR-15 FOR SELF DEFENSE. 

LIKE. THINK ABOUT THE PARENTS.", 'ArylonLovire|3070890765', '2022-05-30T02:21:49.000Z'), ('1531098520614227974', "Obviously in my perfect imaginary world there are NO guns, but baby steps. Beyond reforming America's broken society that pushes outcasts into wanting to commit mass-murder for one shot at recognition, slightly better gun control is a slightly more achievable first step.", 'ArylonLovire|3070890765', '2022-05-30T02:21:48.000Z'), ('1531098518068285441', 'Like, absolutely nobody is willing to aim for a middle-ground, where we could make gun-ownership a little bit more restrictive, just for the sake of maybe just lowering the yearly school shootings down to "Oh no yeah this is actually bad again" levels?', 'ArylonLovire|3070890765', '2022-05-30T02:21:47.000Z'), ('1531098515572772866', 'The issues extend far beyond JUST the guns, but America's politics are so dead-set on an "all or nothing" approach, where even bringing up the idea of better regulation makes someone point fingers and say "THEY ARE TRYING TO TAKE OUR GUNS AWAY!!!"', 'ArylonLovire|3070890765', '2022-05-30T02:21:47.000Z'), ('1531098513056190464', 'Statistically, countries where you need proper licenses and certifications to purchase and own guns, have a lot less gun-related crime.
Not ZERO crimes, because criminals do in fact exist.
But in my humble opinion, less gun crime is better than "desensitized to school shootings"', 'ArylonLovire|3070890765', '2022-05-30T02:21:46.000Z')]

[('1531109180580548608', 'Automotive journalist Leo Parente claimed that Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby was "the most accurate racing film ever, trust me," while emphasizing that he wasn\'t being sarcastic.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-30T03:04:09.000Z'), ('1530341833779294209', "According to writer-director Gary Ross, his son Jack was the one who recommended that John Schwartzman be the cinematographer on Seabiscuit. Jack had just seen The Rookie, Schwartzman's previous film, and loved how it looked visually.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-28T00:15:00.000Z'), ('1528958867379470338', "When the producers were unhappy with the Pang Brothers' initial cut, they enlisted another director ‚Äî Eduardo Rodriguez ‚Äî to helm a round of reshoots.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-24T04:39:35.000Z'), ('1528957501118586880', 'Raimi first offered the directing job to Alexandre Aja, as he was impressed with his work on High Tension. Aja declined in favor of helming the remake of The Hills Have Eyes, thus the job went to the Pang Brothers.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-24T04:34:09.000Z'), ('1528956854000287745', "The project eventually ended up at Raimi's company Ghost House Pictures, who hired several other writers to provide further revisions, including Albert Torres, Mark Wheaton, Chad & Carey W. Hayes, Paul Harris Boardman & Scott Derrickson, Michael B. Gordon, and Richard D'Ovidio.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-24T04:31:35.000Z'), ('1528956528308412417', 'Farmer\'s frequent collaborator Patrick Lussier initially signed on to direct the project for Revolution Studios, who hired Stuart Beattie to perform a rewrite, wanting "The Shining on a farm."', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-24T04:30:17.000Z'), ('1528956340571410432', 'The Sam Raimi-produced horror film The Messengers originated as a screenplay written by Todd Farmer entitled The Scarecrow, a psychological thriller which he described as "the horror version of A Beautiful Mind."', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-24T04:29:32.000Z'), ('1528510711302963201', "One of the Souls of the Damned that attacks the title character in Doctor Strange: In the Multiverse of Madness was voiced by director Sam Raimi's Evil Dead II co-writer Scott Spiegel.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-22T22:58:46.000Z'), ('1528188787280465920', 'Joaquin Phoenix claims to have seen Step Brothers more times than he has seen any other film.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-22T01:39:33.000Z'), ('1528187735181250560', 'Director Adam McKay was supposed to have a small cameo in Anchorman as a network producer named Aaron Zimmerman, who acted much like Robert Evans, but the idea was cut midway through production.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-22T01:35:23.000Z'), ('1527497933662322688', "The character of Rex Blau in Paul Thomas Anderson's Licorice Pizza is based on director Mark Robson, whose credits include Peyton Place, Valley of the Dolls, and Earthquake.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-20T03:54:21.000Z'), ('1526978710490038273', 'Walter Hill, Tobe Hooper, John Landis, Sam Peckinpah, and Michael Ritchie were considered to direct The Thing before John Carpenter was hired.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-18T17:31:09.000Z'), ('1525684536985649152', 'The Opening Day sequence in Fever Pitch was filmed on September 4, 2004, with author Stephen King throwing out the first pitch. The Boston Red Sox lost that game, ending a ten-game winning streak, and King was blamed for it in the Boston Globe.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-15T03:48:34.000Z'), ('1525677932701696001', "In the early 2000's, veteran TV writer and comedy helmer Brian Levant was attached to direct a live-action/animated-hybrid picture for Warner Bros. titled Bad Cop ‚Äì Worse Cop, based on the Looney Tunes character The Tasmanian Devil. The project never got off the ground.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-15T03:22:19.000Z'), ('1525654726154539009', "(500) Days of Summer screenwriters Scott Neustadter and Michael H. Weber have went uncredited for their contributions to the scripts for such projects as Tom & Jerry, The New Mutants, The Longest Ride, Me Before You, Let It Snow, and Where'd You Go, Bernadette?", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-15T01:50:06.000Z'), ('1525651934719447041', 'Steven Spielberg provided a great deal of input in the making of the 2011 remake of Fright Night, such as storyboarding sequences and providing assistance during the editing process.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-15T01:39:01.000Z'), ('1525651389896134658', 'Akiva Goldsman was the original director attached to the re-adaptation of Firestarter; although he eventually left, he stayed onboard as producer and uncredited co-writer. Fatih Akin was then hired to direct, but was replaced a year later with Keith Thomas.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-15T01:36:51.000Z'), ('1525650375239516160', 'Speaking of, when he was stuck in the editing process with an early 150-minute cut, Jonze asked Steven Soderbergh to edit it down with his instincts. Soderbergh came back within 24 hours with a 90-minute cut, which helped Jonze make the final edit, which ran 126 minutes.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-15T01:32:49.000Z'), ('1525650184839077889', "Samantha Morton was originally the voice of Samantha in Spike Jonze's Her. But during the editing process, Jonze felt like something wasn't right. With Morton's blessing, he decided to recast the role with Scarlett Johansson, who re-recorded all of the dialogue.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-15T01:32:03.000Z'), ('1524903499393388552', 'Douglas McGrath was originally attached to helm The Lucky One, even performing a rewrite on the screenplay by Will Fetters. McGrath was eventually replaced as director with Scott Hicks and went uncredited for his contributions to the script.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-13T00:05:00.000Z'), ('1524784802125291522', 'Keira Knightley was initially in talks to star in the Nicholas Sparks adaptation Safe Haven, but she had to drop out due to scheduling conflicts with the John Crowley film Begin Again.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-12T16:13:20.000Z'), ('1523809209942347776', "Speaking of, in the mid-1990's, Universal had plans for third, fourth, and fifth installments in the film series, all made-for-NBC. The third got made, but it was such a failure that the other two were cancelled and Universal never released it on home video in North America.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-09T23:36:41.000Z'), ('1523807714002223104', 'In 2015, it was announced that a television series based on the film Problem Child was in the works at NBC, with Scot Armstrong writing and executive producing, Andrew Fleming directing the pilot, and Matthew Lillard inhabiting the John Ritter role. It ultimately never happened.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-09T23:30:44.000Z'), ('1522018242851745794', 'Benjamin Wallfisch cited Jerry Goldsmith, John Williams, Alan Silvestri, and Dave Grusin as influences on his score for It, feeling passionate about their "big thematic style," while simultaneously wishing to go beyond the idea that it\'d be a purely orchestral, adventurous score.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-05T01:00:01.000Z'), ('1521831628871454720', 'According to Olivia Newton-John, the script for Xanadu was being written during filming. Infamously, co-producer Joel Silver went so far as to lock one of the writers into a room for a few days against his will, refusing to let him out until he finished the script.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-04T12:38:29.000Z'), ('1521670300534026240', "Speaking of, Allan Heinberg ‚Äî who won sole screenplay credit ‚Äî couldn't complete the script due to showrunner commitments on the Shondaland series The Catch. The script had to be finished and rewritten by Geoff Johns and director Patty Jenkins, both of whom went uncredited.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-04T01:57:25.000Z'), ('1521668441714872321', 'Before the five writers were brought on, producer Charles Roven asked Kelly Marcel to write the script but she chose not to, concerned about the number of players involved, particularly when WB hired initial helmer Michelle MacLaren, whose vision contrasted sharply with Marcel‚Äôs.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-04T01:50:02.000Z'), ('1521667867791577089', 'Early in development on Wonder Woman, Warner Bros. hired five writers to compete for the job of penning the screenplay. Each was given a treatment and asked to write a first act. Jason Fuchs ‚Äî who has a story credit in the finished film ‚Äî ultimately won the gig.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-04T01:47:45.000Z'), ('1520966997647192064', "In 2004, producer Jerry Weintraub planned an Oh, God! remake which would've starred Ellen DeGeneres in the titular role. When that didn't happen, he tried again in 2010 with Betty White as God and Paul Rudd in the John Denver part, but that incarnation also never came to be.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-05-02T03:22:45.000Z'), ('1520399291738693633', "Adam Sandler had initially tapped Stephen Kessler to direct Billy Madison. However, two weeks into production, Universal was unhappy with the footage they'd seen and decided to replace him with Tamra Davis.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-04-30T13:46:53.000Z'), ('1519000459322789888', 'In May of 2010, Moviehole reported that Warner Bros. ‚Äî following the commercial success of the Nightmare on Elm Street remake ‚Äî would be developing a Deadly Friend remake, to be put on the fast-track and shot in 3D. Alas, nothing came of this.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-04-26T17:08:25.000Z'), ('1517888216271106050', 'The Birdcage was initially set to star Steve Martin as Armand and Robin Williams as Albert, but Martin left due to scheduling conflicts and Williams asked to play Armand instead, not wanting to be typecast and feeling that the role of Armand would give him more of a challenge.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-04-23T15:28:46.000Z'), ('1516977298951622656', "Daddy's Home was initially intended to be a vehicle for Will Ferrell and Ed Helms, but when Helms left the project, Ferrell took on the role that Helms was supposed to play. Russell. Alas, the project never got off the ground.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-04-18T21:51:23.000Z'), ('1515843472795873280', "In 2000, it was announced that an English-language remake of Hirokazu Kore-eda's After Life was in the works at 20th Century Fox, with a script penned by Lowell Ganz & Babaloo Mandel. Caruso was also attached to another planned comic book film, Y: The Last Man, but he left that project due to creative differences with New Line Cinema. Like The Boys and Preacher, the proposed film was scrapped and it became a television series instead.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-04-16T18:21:31.000Z'), ('1515394036487630852', 'Similarly, another Garth Ennis comic book ‚Äî Preacher ‚Äî was also initially in development as a feature film, with a script penned by John August. Alas, the planned film died.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-04-16T18:17:47.000Z'), ('1515393485884506113', "The Boys was originally in development as a feature film at Sony's Columbia Pictures, with Adam McKay attached to direct from a screenplay by Phil Hay & Matt Manfredi. No further developments came of the project.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-04-16T06:36:21.000Z'), ('1515073175029174279', 'Hired to replace Schlamme as director was Joe Nussbaum, hot off of the success of his short film George Lucas in Love. Alas, Nickelodeon let the project go and it was picked up by New Line Cinema and Walden Media, with Dolman directing from his own script.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-04-15T21:02:48.000Z'), ('1515072673163976709', 'August and Schlamme went through several drafts, but the two never clicked. Norton to tackle the project.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-04-12T06:08:36.000Z'), ('1512648077479485441', "Holmes & Watson was first announced in 2008, with Sacha Baron Cohen cast as Sherlock Holmes and Will Ferrell cast as John Watson, along with Judd Apatow serving as a producer. Matt Damon was then cast as Mann in late August 2013.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-04-06T04:19:51.000Z'), ('1511078256350568448', '...which Alcon Entertainment ultimately refused as they feared that the explicit reference would affect their commercial prospects, even though Ready Player One was released several months after Blade Runner 2049.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-04-04T20:28:25.000Z'), ('1511078229074972677', 'A scene from Ready Player One that was set in the Blade Runner universe was excluded from the finished cut of the film. However, when that film didn't do as well as Disney hoped, this incarnation of the project was scrapped.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-30T03:46:52.000Z'), ('1508867935514857478', 'Dean Cundey served as the second unit director on Deep Rising.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-29T18:05:23.000Z'), ('1508681602536251395', "Dino De Laurentiis approached Ridley Scott to direct the initial film adaptation of Dune, following Scott's recent success with Alien. Scott planned to make Dune before moving on to Blade Runner, but departed the project after he became overwhelmed by the extensive work involved.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-29T05:44:58.000Z'), ('1508680646805409793', 'https://t.co/gNhRueEaY4', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-29T05:41:10.000Z'), ('1508677928938262528', 'John Boorman, Guillermo del Toro, David Fincher, Rob Minkoff, and M. Night Shyamalan were considered to direct The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe before Andrew Adamson was hired.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-29T05:30:22.000Z'), ('1506409135184572418', "John Landis was originally attached to direct Dunston Checks In. Eventually, Ken Kwapis replaced Landis in the director's chair while Landis went off to direct The Stupids instead.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-22T23:15:00.000Z'), ('1506405360277639178', "Before Colin Trevorrow was attached to The Book of Henry, it was originally set to be directed by Thea Sharrock, in what would've been her feature directorial debut. On the subject of Nicholson winning the role, Dourif joked during a Comic-Con panel: "He takes all my roles."', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-19T02:20:00.000Z'), ('1504602968800337932', 'In a 2012 interview, Jay Chandrasekhar of Broken Lizard revealed that he was once approached by Warner Bros. to direct a Caddyshack remake, but he refused: "I think people will string me up if I tried to do that. I\'d have loved to have had this conversation, but I could never."', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-17T23:37:56.000Z'), ('1503891058249318404', "Speaking of, the scene involving the Baby Ruth candy bar being thrown into the swimming pool was based on a real-life incident at co-writer Brian Doyle-Murray's high school.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-16T00:29:03.000Z'), ('1503890447894261760', 'Carl Spackler was originally a silent character in the script for Caddyshack, in the manner of Harpo Marx, but after Bill Murray was cast, director Harold Ramis encouraged Murray to speak and improvise.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-16T00:26:38.000Z'), ('1503889630244098051', 'Chase ultimately relented when Warner Bros. executive Bill Gerber suggested Las Vegas as the setting, feeling that the juxtaposition of the nuclear family in a city driven by sex and gambling would make for a more entertaining film.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-16T00:23:23.000Z'), ('1503889586291941376', 'Early in development on Vegas Vacation, star Chevy Chase had pitched his own idea for a fourth Vacation film, Swiss Family Griswold, in which the Griswolds find themselves stranded on a deserted island.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-16T00:23:12.000Z'), ('1503844486669033477', "The script was written almost entirely by Robert Klane, with some input from director Amy Heckerling. However, Klane was asked to incorporate unused elements from Hughes' script for the first film. This ultimately resulted in Hughes being awarded a writing credit by the WGA.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-15T21:24:00.000Z'), ('1503844234650136578', "Despite having a story and screenplay credit, John Hughes had absolutely nothing to do with National Lampoon's European Vacation. In fact, he had no idea a sequel was even being made until he saw a preview of it on television.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-15T21:23:00.000Z'), ('1503178641353715715', 'Lawrence Kasdan was originally set to direct Say Anything, but he ultimately passed on the project, telling writer ‚Äî and eventual helmer ‚Äî Cameron Crowe, "You are that main character. You should direct it."', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-14T01:18:10.000Z'), ('1502872959815409664', 'For the Ron Howard film Backdraft, stars Kurt Russell, Kevin Casey, Scott Glenn, and William Baldwin did a lot of their own stunts, and stunt coordinator Walter Scott was so impressed by their work that he had them listed as stunt performers in the credits.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-13T05:03:30.000Z'), ('1502491897687949313', 'The Adam Project was originally set up at Paramount in 2012 under the title Our Name Is Adam, with Tom Cruise being attached to star. The project languished in development hell until it was revived at Netflix in 2020.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-12T03:49:18.000Z'), ('1502465482103963652', 'Speaking of, the project was originally intended as a vehicle for Rick Moranis, but he declined. The role was also offered to Judd Nelson and Alan Rickman before Jim Carrey was ultimately cast.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-12T02:04:20.000Z'), ('1502465073012477957', 'At one point, the producers of Ace Ventura: Pet Detective considered making the character female, being named Alice instead, and with Whoopi Goldberg as their preferred casting choice.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-12T02:02:42.000Z'), ('1502257879700680704', "Bryan Cranston had to decline a role in M. Night Shyamalan's thriller Old due to a scheduling conflict caused by his involvement with filming Your Honor in New Orleans.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-11T12:19:23.000Z'), ('1501424868453232645', "The psychological horror thriller Hide and Seek was originally set to be helmed by Albert Hughes, in what would've been his first solo outing as a director. Hughes walked away from the film due to creative differences and was soon replaced with John Polson, fresh off of Swimfan.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-09T05:09:18.000Z'), ('1501058126014869505', "Tim Roth has said that the making of the English-language remake of Funny Games traumatized him and that he'll never watch it. He said that he was especially disturbed because Devon Gearhart, who played his son in the film, resembled his own son.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-08T04:52:00.000Z'), ('1500942246425907200', 'After Mann left, Spike Lee was attached to direct and Christian Bale was reportedly eyed for the lead role. Eventually, Lee was replaced with Stephen Gaghan and Matthew McConaughey was cast as the lead.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-07T21:11:32.000Z'), ('1500941884604260356', 'The 2016 film Gold was written by Patrick Massett and John Zinman as a writing sample and developed by executive producer Paul Haggis, who showed it to Michael Mann, who liked the script and joined the project as director, but eventually exited due to working on Blackhat.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-07T21:10:06.000Z'), ('1500640238984732677', "Speaking of, shredded condoms were used to create tendons of the Xenomorph's jaws.\n\nIn other words, Ridley Scott and company made better use of condoms in 1978 than Jared Leto did in 2015.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-07T01:11:28.000Z'), ('1500639804094128131', 'For the film Alien, the blue laser lights that were used in the egg chamber were borrowed from The Who. The band was testing out the lasers for their stage show in the soundstage next door.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-07T01:09:44.000Z'), ('1500525365806059523', 'Michael Bay, Edgar Wright, Daniel Espinosa, Joe Cornish, Justin Lin, Sam Raimi, Francis Lawrence, and Colin Trevorrow were all considered by Sony to direct Bloodshot. Bay turned it down, while Wright declined because he was gearing up to finally make Baby Driver.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-06T17:35:00.000Z'), ('1499567843880456193', 'Warner Bros initially tried to mount their notorious film adaptation of The Bonfire of the Vanities with directors Adrian Lyne and Norman Jewison, but the project never materialized with either.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-04T02:10:09.000Z'), ('1499243144856150016', "The Newman version would've criticized U.S. military culture and portrayed Colonel Trautman as the film's villain, ending with both Rambo and Teasle dying. Sydney Pollack considered directing, hiring David Rabe for a rewrite. After Pollack left, Mike Nichols considered directing.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-03T04:39:54.000Z'), ('1499242889146159104', 'Afterward, John Calley purchased the rights at Warner Bros. for $125,000 with the thought of casting either Robert De Niro or Clint Eastwood as Rambo. A screenplay was written by Walter Newman with Martin Ritt intended to direct.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-03T04:38:54.000Z'), ('1499242591413493761', "Brooks' planned version would have ended with Teasle ordering his men to drop their guns to try to reason with Rambo, who would have then been fatally shot by an unknown assailant.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-03T04:37:43.000Z'), ('1499242537411923970', 'Richard Brooks was slated to direct First Blood back in 1972, and he intended the film be an allegory on differing American perceptions of World War II and Vietnam War veterans, with Sheriff Teasle portrayed more sympathetically than in the novel.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-03-03T04:37:30.000Z'), ('1498434398143795204', "For the film Year of the Dragon, the sets proved realistic enough to fool even Stanley Kubrick, who attended the film's premiere. Director Michael Cimino actually had to convince the Bronx-born Kubrick that the film's exteriors were shot on the DEG backlot and not on-location.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-28T23:06:14.000Z'), ('1498433896723144704', 'Stanley Kubrick cast Kevyn Major Howard in Full Metal Jacket after seeing him in Death Wish II.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-28T23:04:15.000Z'), ('1498432291705884679', "Development on the Death Wish remake first began in 2006, with Sylvester Stallone directing. His take would've seen Paul Kersey as a cop who had success without using his gun, so when his family's attacked, he's thrown into a moral dilemma in proceeding to carry out his revenge.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-28T22:57:52.000Z'), ('1498429765555998722', 'The original 1974 film adaptation of Death Wish was initially supposed to be directed by Sidney Lumet, with Jack Lemmon playing Paul Kersey and Henry Fonda co-starring as Lieutenant Frank Ochoa. Alas, Lumet bowed out in favor of helming Serpico.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-28T22:47:50.000Z'), ('1497780258359103492', "20th Century Fox wanted Warren Beatty to play Gordon Gekko in Wall Street, but he wasn't interested. Oliver Stone's initial choice was Richard Gere, who passed. Ultimately, Stone went with Michael Douglas, despite having been advised by others in Hollywood not to cast him.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-27T03:46:55.000Z'), ('1497779314007412737', "However, Stone confirmed that he dropped out of the project due to creative differences as of January 2014. According to Stone, the King estate didn't approve of Stone's script because it featured King's adultery.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-27T03:43:10.000Z'), ('1497779210831773696', "In the 1990's, Oliver Stone tried to make Memphis, a biopic about the life of Martin Luther King, Jr. that was to have been distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. In 2013, it was announced that Stone would make the film for Warner Bros. and DreamWorks, with Jamie Foxx starring.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-27T03:42:45.000Z'), ('1497417006328557572', 'Ron Howard turned down offers to direct Mr. Mom and Footloose, instead opting to make Splash.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-26T03:43:29.000Z'), ('1497408329882210305', 'Murch finished the film on schedule, though while in post-production, studio management had changed. The new executives had little faith in the project, and ultimately doomed it with limited promotion and a very short theatrical run.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-26T03:09:01.000Z'), ('1497408167319330821', 'Murch contacted his friends ‚Äî Francis Ford Coppola, Steven Spielberg, and George Lucas ‚Äî for help, and all three successfully lobbied Disney to rehire Murch. Lucas even offered to take over directing duties himself should Murch fall behind schedule. (2/?)', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-26T03:08:22.000Z'), ('1497408011249274880', "Disney fired director Walter Murch about one week into production on Return to Oz due to budget concerns. The studio found the dailies lacking and Murch's slow pace during shooting to be disheartening. (1/?)", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-26T03:07:45.000Z'), ('1497406548540379136', 'Due to having a miserable experience making The Godfather, Francis Ford Coppola originally opted to just be a writer-producer on Part II and wanted Martin Scorsese to direct. However, Paramount refused, luring Coppola back by promising him significantly more creative control.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-26T03:01:56.000Z'), ('1497403768647868424', 'Steven Spielberg is a big fan of Twin Peaks and he even expressed interest in directing the first episode of the second season, May the Giant Be with You, before David Lynch decided to direct the episode himself.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-26T02:50:53.000Z'), ('1497264062975127552', 'The last was an expensive HBO miniseries that was to be executive produced by Mel Gibson through his independent production company Icon Productions. One of the writers, directors, and co-executive producers attached was David Frankel, fresh off of Band of Brothers.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-25T17:35:45.000Z'), ('1497263585566892038', 'Another also had DiCaprio set to star, prior to the Luhrmann project. This one was to be directed by Martin Scorsese, from a screenplay penned by Christopher McQuarrie ‚Äî who initially wanted to direct it himself ‚Äî alongside playwright and Alexander obsessive Peter Buchman.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-25T17:33:51.000Z'), ('1497262855741222912', 'One was a film that from producer Dino De Laurentiis. Baz Luhrmann was attached to direct, taking over for Ridley Scott. The script was penned by Ted Tally and then eventually rewritten by Luhrmann alongside David Hare. Leonardo DiCaprio and Nicole Kidman were to star.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-25T17:30:57.000Z'), ('1497262056449396738', "Before Oliver Stone's Alexander entered production, three other competing Alexander the Great projects were in development around the same time, and ultimately, all three of them never came to fruition.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-25T17:27:46.000Z'), ('1497049814390951939', "George Clooney had expressed interest in directing Killers of the Flower Moon prior to Martin Scorsese's involvement with the project.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-25T03:24:24.000Z'), ('1496958110241628160', "Before Steven Spielberg agreed to direct Schindler's List, he offered it to Roman Polanski (who wasn't ready to deal with the subject matter), Martin Scorsese (who thought a Jewish director was better suited), and Billy Wilder (who finally told Spielberg he should do it himself).", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-24T21:20:00.000Z'), ('1496920802297630726', 'Jurors awarded Coppola $20 million as compensation for losing Pinocchio, as well as a further $60 million in punitive damages on top, stemming from his charges that Warner Bros. sabotaged the project. This is the largest civil financial verdict ever against a Hollywood studio.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-24T18:51:45.000Z'), ('1496920524374609932', 'Later that year, Coppola and Warners came to a disagreement over compensation to be paid to Coppola for his directing services on Pinocchio. Both parties deferred the issue and a settlement was finally reached seven years later.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-24T18:50:39.000Z'), ('1496920264000643083', 'In 1991, Francis Ford Coppola was attached to direct an adaptation of The Adventures of Pinocchio for Warner Bros. Pictures, as well as produce a J. Edgar Hoover biopic for the studio. Ultimately, neither of them came to fruition.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-24T18:49:37.000Z'), ('1496917173545345026', 'The role was later rewritten for Forest Whitaker, but due to scheduling conflicts prior to filming, Whitaker was replaced by Curtis "50 Cent" Jackson before the part finally went to Terry Crews.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-24T18:37:20.000Z'), ('1496917042313646083', "The character of Hale Caesar in The Expendables was initially conceived as a role for Wesley Snipes, who turned it down because of his tax issues as well as being unable to leave the United States without the court's approval.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-24T18:36:48.000Z'), ('1496916135190872064', "The Karen National Liberation Army has said that the 2008 film Rambo gave them a great boost of morale. and played the girlfriend of Dolph Lundgren in I Come in Peace.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-02-16T01:37:00.000Z'), ('1492201948786868232', 'Shut In, whose script by Melanie Toast was featured on the 2018 Black List, was initially slated to be produced by New Line Cinema with Jason Bateman attached to direct. ('1486957476343861253', 'First Man, Zombieland: Double Tap, Coming 2 America, Red Notice, and Hawkeye were all partly filmed at Tyler Perry Studios.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-26T14:48:25.000Z'), ('1485241663865991173', 'Disney‚Äôs English-language dub of Hayao Miyazaki‚Äôs Ponyo can, in a way, be considered a Pixar co-production as the dub was directed by John Lasseter, Brad Lewis and Peter Sohn of the company.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-23T13:23:01.000Z'), ('1484383084522921985', "Simon and Ashby clashed frequently, as Ashby normally gave actors leeway to improvise while Simon didn't take too kindly to his writing being tampered with. Herbert Ross was the initial choice to direct, but he was unavailable, so hired instead was Hal Ashby, who was suffering from drug addiction while the film was being developed.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-21T04:28:52.000Z'), ('1484378702511165440', "Someone from the set claimed that at one point during filming, Basinger pushed Rees aside and tried to direct a musical number herself. Basinger also had the original cinematographer on the project fired because she didn't like how she looked in the test shots that he had taken.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-21T04:13:55.000Z'), ('1484378037693165568', 'Speaking of, frequent Simon collaborator Herbert Ross was initially attached to direct the picture, but he eventually dropped out and was replaced with Jerry Rees, an animation director ‚Äî best known for The Brave Little Toaster ‚Äî who made his live-action debut on the film.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-21T04:11:17.000Z'), ('1484377183678197763', '...claiming he didn\'t understand comedy. This caused the budget to balloon from $15 million to $26 million. When production wrapped, producer David Permut presented each member of the crew with a T-shirt emblazoned with the phrase: "I survived the reshoot of The Marrying Man."', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-21T04:07:53.000Z'), ('1484376883869351942', 'Baldwin threw violent temper tantrums during which he tossed chairs, smashed camera lenses, punched a dent in his trailer, and swore at crew members; while Basinger refused to do extra takes, demanded constant delays to fix her hair, and caused Simon to storm off the set after...', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-21T04:06:42.000Z'), ('1484376602590932994', "Neil Simon's The Marrying Man had a notoriously troubled production thanks to its stars Kim Basinger and Alec Baldwin's grossly unprofessional behavior. Tom Savini and Peter Jackson were also considered to direct. Jon Hess lobbied, but his ideas were considered too dark and gruesome.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-19T06:22:02.000Z'), ('1483684451242717380', 'The famous Lady in the Lake teaser trailer for Leatherface: Texas Chainsaw Massacre III was filmed before New Line Cinema had even hired a director for the project or had a finished script.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-19T06:15:13.000Z'), ('1482961338687180803', "While on promotional duty for Insidious: The Last Key, producer Jason Blum stated that a crossover between Insidious and Sinister had been considered previously, and although it ultimately didn't happen, there was still a desire to revisit the idea at some point in the future.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-17T06:21:49.000Z'), ('1482947162858270720', 'When Carpenter, a noted fan of westerns (particularly those directed by John Ford and Howard Hawks), was asked why he never directed one, he explained: "You have to clean up all the horse shit after each shot."', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-17T05:25:30.000Z'), ('1482946533746253826', "John Carpenter once said in a 1982 interview that while he thought the R rating for Halloween was justifiable, The Fog should've been rated PG.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-17T05:23:00.000Z'), ('1482945813684924416', "Speaking of, according to cinematographer John Mathieson, the filmmakers were unsure as to whether the ending of Thomas Harris' novel would work or not, so three separate endings were filmed: one for Harris, one for De Laurentiis, and one for Scott. Scott's ending prevailed.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-17T05:20:08.000Z'), ('1482945171406917632', 'When Dino De Laurentiis offered Ridley Scott the job of directing Hannibal, Scott thought he was speaking of the general and historical figure who nearly brought down the Roman Empire. Hirschbiegel opted not to leave Downfall after legal action was threatened against him.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-13T21:27:01.000Z'), ('1481681196740456454', 'In order to get an authentic look for the role of Max Cady in Cape Fear, Robert De Niro paid a dentist $5,000 to intentionally mess up his teeth. He paid another $20,000 for his teeth to be fixed afterwards.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-13T17:35:00.000Z'), ('1481679940558807040', "During filming for the dinner scene in Django Unchained, Leonardo DiCaprio accidentally cut his hand open. But he didn't flinch and cameras kept rolling as DiCaprio finished the scene by wiping his own blood on Kerry Washington's face.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-13T17:30:00.000Z'), ('1481644100507996164', 'Quiz Show screenwriter Paul Attanasio was brought in as a script doctor to work on the film Patch Adams prior to shooting.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-13T15:07:35.000Z'), ('1481532861148712961', 'Speaking of, before Dustin Hoffman was cast as Captain Hook, other actors considered for the part included David Bowie, Christopher Lloyd, and Donald Sutherland.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-13T07:45:34.000Z'), ('1481532631854497797', 'Tom Hanks was director Steven Spielberg‚Äôs original choice for the role of Peter Pan in Hook before Robin Williams was cast.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-13T07:44:39.000Z'), ('1481507679260614660', 'Bojan Bazelli is one of the very few contemporary DPs to have always been a cinematographer, having never climbed the ranks through the camera, lighting, or other departments. He was hired straight out of film school by director Abel Ferrara to shoot China Girl.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-13T06:05:30.000Z'), ('1481488194080280576', 'Mads Mikkelsen, Damian Lewis, and Jean Dujardin were considered for the part of Electro in The Amazing Spider-Man 2 before Jamie Foxx landed the role.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-13T04:48:04.000Z'), ('1481487881571082241', 'Josh Hutcherson, Logan Lerman, Alden Ehrenreich, Anton Yelchin, and Jamie Bell were the final contenders for the role of Peter Parker in The Amazing Spider-Man before Andrew Garfield was ultimately cast.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-13T04:46:50.000Z'), ('1481485976442712065', 'Speaking of, Johnson showed interest in returning to write and direct a sequel that was based on the Born Again storyline, as well as suggesting Mr. Fear as a possible villain. Alas, the sequel was never to be.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-13T04:39:16.000Z'), ('1481485448224686082', 'Chris Columbus was originally chosen to direct Daredevil, collaborating with Carlo Carlei on writing duties as well. Alas, in 2000, they were replaced with Mark Steven Johnson, whose screenplay was praised by Kevin Feige as one of the strongest scripts that Marvel had received.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-13T04:37:10.000Z'), ('1481484074862759936', 'Jonathan Demme was originally attached to direct Insomnia and considered Harrison Ford for the role of Will Dormer.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-13T04:31:42.000Z'), ('1481148901742850048', 'In July 2016, it was announced that Cliff Martinez would compose the score for Logan. Five months later, Martinez was replaced with Marco Beltrami, a frequent collaborator of director James Mangold.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-12T06:19:51.000Z'), ('1481147572853088256', "Speaking of, at different times during development, James Cameron and David Fincher read Rhett Reese & Paul Wernick's script and championed the project to Fox executives.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-12T06:14:34.000Z'), ('1481146283595382785', "Ryan Reynolds was attached to Deadpool as far back as 2004, when the project was first set up at New Line Cinema with David S. Goyer writing and directing. Alas, this iteration didn't move forward due to rights issues with 20th Century Fox and their X-Men film franchise.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-12T06:09:27.000Z'), ('1480807133440581632', "The 1987 comedy Blind Date was originally set up at George Harrison's production company HandMade Films and intended as a vehicle for the recently married Madonna and Sean Penn, but they both backed out after the project failed to attract a director.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-11T07:41:47.000Z'), ('1480805809114296323', "During post-production on Ishtar, three teams of editors ‚Äî one each for producer-star Warren Beatty, co-star Dustin Hoffman, and writer-director Elaine May ‚Äî worked almost continuously to produce cuts of the film to each principal's liking.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-11T07:36:31.000Z'), ('1480804601771220992', 'Brian De Palma really wanted to direct Cruising, but his producers could not obtain the rights to the novel, so he made Dressed to Kill instead.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-11T07:31:43.000Z'), ('1479961190436675589', 'Music video helmer Paul Hunter was initially attached to direct Constantine in 1999. In 2001, he was replaced with Tarsem Singh and Nicolas Cage was set to play the title character, but they both later dropped out.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-08T23:40:18.000Z'), ('1479950060259577861', 'Writer-director Paul Thomas Anderson reportedly went about adapting the Thomas Pynchon novel Inherent Vice by typing it up word for word, then proceeding from there.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-08T22:56:05.000Z'), ('1479655752704958469', 'In 2013, Robert Downey, Jr. optioned the Black Mirror episode The Entire History of You to potentially be made into a film by Warner Bros. and his production company Team Downey. Five years later, writer Jesse Armstrong said that the project was in development hell.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-08T03:26:36.000Z'), ('1479626039898816518', 'Speaking of, storyboard artist Jane Wu urged director Alan Taylor ‚Äî her boyfriend ‚Äî to turn down the offer after reading the script, insisting that he should direct something more personal.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-08T01:28:32.000Z'), ('1479625591477387267', 'Laeta Kalogridis and Patrick Lussier turned down the offer to write the script for Terminator: Genisys three times, but James Cameron persuaded them to accept the job.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-08T01:26:45.000Z'), ('1479623235163627521', 'Timothy Olyphant, Gary Sinise, and Djimon Hounsou auditioned for the role of the Silver Surfer in Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer before Doug Jones and Laurence Fishburne were ultimately cast.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-08T01:17:23.000Z'), ('1479621975559618562', "During the buildup to The Avengers, Marvel considered filming the rest of their projects on 3D cameras. However, after shooting with them proved to be a nightmare for Thor's post-credit scene, as well as Stellan Skarsg√•rd's discomfort with them, the idea was ultimately dropped.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-08T01:12:23.000Z'), ('1479621715231756289', "Iron Fist was originally set to be made into a film in the early 2000's, with Ray Park playing Danny Rand. John Turman penned the script, with Rich Wilkes doing a rewrite. Che-Kirk Wong was set to direct but left and was replaced with Steve Carr. Alas, the project never happened.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-08T01:11:21.000Z'), ('1479620836415971329', 'When the rights to Daredevil reverted from 20th Century Fox back to Marvel, its incorporation into the MCU initially began as a pitch for a film. Ultimately, it was determined that the idea was too low-stakes and low-budget to work as a feature.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-08T01:07:52.000Z'), ('1479616575409991684', "The climax would've taken place in downtown New York atop the U.N. building. Unfortunately, Corman was ill-equipped to handle Lee's ambitious, big-budget vision for the film. Eventually, Orion ‚Äî concerned that the film would run over-budget ‚Äî allowed the rights to expire.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-08T00:50:56.000Z'), ('1479616291870806017', "The script, in addition to being a faithful adaptation of the character's origin story, would've featured a college-aged Peter Parker fighting to stop Doctor Octopus and avert nuclear war with Russia. Peter's love interests would've been Mary Jane Watson and a KGB agent. (2/?)", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-08T00:49:48.000Z'), ('1479616032574738438', 'The first genuine attempt to develop a live-action Spider-Man film for a theatrical release occurred in 1982. Roger Corman, who was a fan of the comics, acquired the rights to the property through Orion Pictures, and hired Stan Lee himself to write the screenplay. (1/?)', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-08T00:48:46.000Z'), ('1479613903390879748', "Die Hard with a Vengeance was adapted from a script called Simon Says, which was briefly intended to be used as the basis for the third Lethal Weapon film. The script included a character who would've been played by Brandon Lee and the character of Zeus was intended to be female.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-08T00:40:19.000Z'), ('1479612499683168257', 'Tobey Maguire and Shia LaBeouf were considered to play Will Rodman in Rise of the Planet of the Apes before James Franco was ultimately cast.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-08T00:34:44.000Z'), ('1479610375259701248', 'Speaking of, Reynor admitted that the controversial age-gap joke wasn\'t even in the script initially: "That wasn\'t something that came up until we were in production."', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-08T00:26:17.000Z'), ('1479609650970509319', "Jack Reynor hated his time working on Transformers: Age of Extinction, claiming that Mark Wahlberg bullied him relentlessly. Notably, he didn't return for its sequel, Transformers: The Last Knight.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-08T00:23:25.000Z'), ('1479609335886061568', 'Back in 2016, Zack Snyder had to shoot a scene for Justice League with the team in a truck making quips while transporting Superman\'s coffin. He called it "the worst thing [he\'s] ever seen" and didn\'t include it in his director\'s cut.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-08T00:22:10.000Z'), ('1479176192024526855', "Captain Marvel was included in an early draft of the script for Avengers: Age of Ultron, but Marvel chose to remove her appearance because the character hadn't yet been cast and they didn't want to introduce her before being able to explore her backstory and personality first.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-06T19:41:00.000Z'), ('1479162098232008710', "An earlier iteration of the Shang-Chi film was to have been made by DreamWorks in the mid-2000's, with Ang Lee as a producer and Yuen Woo-ping directing from a script by Bruce C. McKenna. Alas, this version failed to materialize and the rights to the character reverted to Marvel.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-06T18:45:00.000Z'), ('1478929634595123203', "Speaking of, the film began as a script written in 1993 titled Knuckle Sandwich, a 1960's-set ultra-violent gangster comedy that would've seen Barry, a professional thief, navigating the criminal underworld in order to hunt down his ex-wife, Lena, so they can share one last kiss.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-06T03:21:16.000Z'), ('1478927860098338820', 'Sean Penn was originally cast as Dean Trumbell in Punch-Drunk Love, but he had to drop out, thus he was replaced with Philip Seymour Hoffman.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-06T03:14:13.000Z'), ('1478611221658193922', "In 2009, the Coen brothers stated that they were interested in making a sequel to Barton Fink called Old Fink, which would take place in the 1960's, around the same time period as A Serious Man.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-05T06:16:01.000Z'), ('1478058341641433097', 'Tatum originally wanted Nicolas Winding Refn to direct the first Magic Mike film, but Refn had to turn it down due to scheduling conflicts with Only God Forgives.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-03T17:39:04.000Z'), ('1478058234346975242', "Speaking of, Jada Pinkett Smith's role was originally intended for Jamie Foxx, but to her surprise, Channing Tatum asked her to take over for Foxx in the final hours.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-03T17:38:38.000Z'), ('1478057899775737868', 'Margot Robbie was originally considered for the role of Zoe in Magic Mike XXL, but she turned it down due to scheduling conflicts with Focus. Amber Heard was cast instead.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-03T17:37:18.000Z'), ('1478056625575452674', 'Hill showed the scene to now-disgraced producer Scott Rudin, himself a gay man, who asked, "Would you guys have had this conversation back then?" When Hill said no, Rudin said it would be "more offensive to put that [scene] in the movie than to show it how it actually was."', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-03T17:32:15.000Z'), ('1478056327771529228', 'Jonah Hill admitted in an interview that he was afraid of being accused of bigotry because of repeated use of the word "f***ot" in his film Mid90s, so much so that he considered shooting a scene where the child characters debate over whether they should be using the word. (1/2)', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-03T17:31:04.000Z'), ('1477889784043524099', "Director Marco Brambilla was originally working to make Richie Rich, starring Macaulay Culkin, but he wasn't able to get the budget he needed. Brambilla instead directed another Joel Silver production, Demolition Man, getting the job based on a recommendation from David Fincher.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-03T06:29:17.000Z'), ('1477761160627867655', "In the 1990's, Quentin Tarantino considered doing a Luke Cage film. A fan of the character, Tarantino held a meeting with producer Edward R. Pressman, who owned the rights, and pitched a take starring Laurence Fishburne. Tarantino eventually shifted his interest for Pulp Fiction.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-02T21:58:10.000Z'), ('1477759355982393349', 'The Wachowskis were once set to produce a third Conan film, King Conan: Crown of Iron, with John Milius returning as writer-director. However, the two clashed with Milius over tone and direction. Alas, it was canned due to their lack of interest after wrapping the Matrix sequels.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-02T21:51:00.000Z'), ('1477703283456229377', "Darren Aronofsky's The Fountain originally went into production in 2002, starring Brad Pitt and Cate Blanchett, with a $75 million budget. Weeks before filming was to begin, Pitt and Warner Bros. both demanded script changes. Pitt eventually left, which killed off the production.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-02T18:08:11.000Z'), ('1477700990740705288', 'The Vin Diesel vehicle A Man Apart originally wrapped production in early 2001, but it was delayed four times due to poor test screenings. New Line Cinema ordered reshoots, but director F. Gary Gray was too busy making The Italian Job, so John Herzfeld was hired to take over.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-02T17:59:05.000Z'), ('1477700012343799834', "In 2011, Christopher Nolan's production company Syncopy set up a supernatural thriller at Warner Bros. and tapped Christine star and veteran TV helmer Keith Gordon to write and direct. The project quietly died, never to materialize.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-02T17:55:11.000Z'), ('1477699082688897026', 'Speaking of, an earlier iteration of the project was to have been directed by Hype Williams ‚Äî fresh off of Belly ‚Äî from a script by Den of Thieves helmer Christian Gudegast and Prison Break creator Paul Scheuring. They all left when the production failed to materialize.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-02T17:51:30.000Z'), ('1477698399478628358', 'For Speed Racer, the Wachowskis opted to shoot it on HD cameras ‚Äî a first for the sisters ‚Äî as the format allowed them to utilize a layering approach that gave equal clarity to the foreground and background of each scene in the film, creating the appearance of real-life anime.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-02T17:48:47.000Z'), ('1477696510833958914', 'According to co-writers David Mitchell and Aleksander Hemon, The Matrix Resurrections originally featured an action scene with Morpheus fighting a giant mechanical monster called Animalium, but it was cut from the script as the CGI would have cost too much to build it.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-02T17:41:17.000Z'), ('1477079505818857473', "Outside of Pixar's Cars, none of the big summer tentpoles of 2006 ‚Äî i.e. The Da Vinci Code, Superman Returns, and Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest ‚Äî were ever screened for test audiences prior to release.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2022-01-01T00:49:31.000Z'), ('1476696000790106117', 'In a 2014 interview with Christopher Priest, the author of The Prestige, he admitted that Sam Mendes ‚Äî not Christopher Nolan ‚Äî was his first choice to direct a film adaptation.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-30T23:25:36.000Z'), ('1476639109116571653', "According to editor Paul Hirsch, he was at one point set to direct a John Hughes script titled The Nanny, re-teaming with Hughes after cutting Ferris Bueller's Day Off; Planes, Trains & Automobiles; and Dutch. When the lattermost was a box office bomb, the project never happened.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-30T19:39:32.000Z'), ('1476452279603585024', "Monica Potter performed her final audition for her role in the film Patch Adams in Robin Williams' house in front of his wife. Although she was stricken with the flu at the time, Potter still had to play out an intimate kissing scene.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-30T07:17:09.000Z'), ('1475663813764694019', 'Speaking of, T.J. Miller had a nearly fatal brain disease while shooting the film and required surgery.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-28T03:04:04.000Z'), ('1475663352043089921', "Animator Ash Brannon was originally set to direct Yogi Bear in what would've been his live-action debut, but he was eventually replaced with visual effects artist Eric Brevig when Warner Bros. decided to use the film as a means of cashing in on the 3D craze popularized by Avatar.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-28T03:02:14.000Z'), ('1473322391686238213', 'In 1980, Spielberg contacted Gary David Goldberg to make a semi-autobiographical musical film entitled Reel to Reel, surrounding a filmmaker named Stuart Moss and his direction of a musical remake of Invaders from Mars. The project was to have been directed by Michael Cimino.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-21T16:00:05.000Z'), ('1473321449364598790', "In 2015, Spielberg was set to direct the Lynsey Addario biopic It's What I Do, starring Jennifer Lawrence. In 2018, they were replaced with Ridley Scott and Scarlett Johansson, respectively. Johansson left after discovering it was funded by Saudi crown prince Mohammed bin Salman.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-21T15:56:21.000Z'), ('1473320413690220552', 'In 1996, Spielberg was slated to direct Meet the Parents, with Jim Carrey ‚Äî who even came up with the name Greg Focker ‚Äî starring; Al Pacino was considered for the role of Jack Byrnes. However, both Spielberg and Carrey left the project due to schedule conflicts.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-21T15:52:14.000Z'), ('1473319372940845058', 'In 2016, Steven Spielberg was confirmed to direct The Kidnapping of Edgardo Mortara, with Mark Rylance and Oscar Isaac starring and a script by Tony Kushner. The project eventually lost steam after Spielberg was unable to find the right child actor to play the young Jewish boy.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-21T15:48:06.000Z'), ('1470387494797647873', 'According to an interview with Spike Lee, Ron Howard was originally attached to to direct Inside Man, but Russell Crowe showed him the script for Cinderella Man and Howard opted to make that film instead.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-13T13:37:51.000Z'), ('1470384917733335044', 'Writer Jesse Armstrong originally conceived Succession as a feature film about the Murdoch family, but the script never went into production.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-13T13:27:37.000Z'), ('1470255759447539716', 'Peter Lambert edited a portion of The Twilight Saga: New Moon during his daily commute, making it the first major motion picture in which the biggest portion of the first assembly of the film was edited in the backseat of a car.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-13T04:54:23.000Z'), ('1470254269370675203', "Jonathan Taylor Thomas was Universal's top choice for the role of Jim in American Pie, but he turned the part down and Jason Biggs was cast instead.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-13T04:48:28.000Z'), ('1470253609883512836', "According to Lee, Sally Field and Hector Babenco told him that Wim Wenders was the one responsible for Do the Right Thing losing out on the Palme D'or at Cannes to Sex, Lies and Videotape.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-13T04:45:51.000Z'), ('1470252994923053059', 'Lee also vied for the director\'s seat on Ali. He said that he knew he wouldn\'t get the job after speaking to the film\'s star, Will Smith ‚Äî one of the many financiers on Lee\'s film Get on the Bus ‚Äî who wanted Lee to make a film with "a broader appeal."', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-13T04:43:24.000Z'), ('1470252765398118401', 'When Norman Jewison was originally hired to direct Malcolm X, Spike Lee met with him and convinced him to "sit this one out." Feeling that only a Black director was qualified and would bring the necessary perspective, Lee then stepped in as director with Jewison\'s blessing.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-13T04:42:29.000Z'), ('1467171098043240448', 'Martian Child was originally shot in 2005, but New Line Cinema bounced the release date around for two years. It was eventually dated for November 2, 2007 and then New Line ordered last-minute extensive reshoots, with Jerry Zucker filling in for original helmer Menno Meyjes.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-04T16:37:03.000Z'), ('1466980601853091845', 'Hilariously, Black Dog was to be the second of a three-picture deal for Sorbo at Universal following Kull the Conquerer, and his departure from the former film came just three weeks after the latter film opened to poor critical reviews and abysmal box office.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-04T04:00:05.000Z'), ('1466979843929780225', 'Kevin Sorbo was originally set to star in the 1998 action thriller Black Dog, but a few days into production, he dropped out after his representatives said he had an aneurysm in his left shoulder. Universal quickly replaced  Sorbo with Patrick Swayze.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-04T03:57:04.000Z'), ('1466951375926050817', 'Speaking of, the film began as a Bruce Joel Rubin script: The George Dunlap Tape. Rubin raised $400K, secured filming locations in Indiana, had props built, and assembled a cast/SFX team. As filming was about to start, the investor withdrew their funds and production collapsed.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-04T02:03:57.000Z'), ('1466949117528182789', "Director Douglas Trumbull originally wanted to shoot his troubled 1983 sci-fi film Brainstorm in Showscan, a sixty-frame-per-second widescreen process he'd developed, but the costs of retrofitting theaters to show it proved prohibitive.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-04T01:54:58.000Z'), ('1466750815633350657', 'After filming was halted on The Matrix Resurrections due to the pandemic, Lana Wachowski contemplated never finishing it and letting it "go down as an incomplete legendary film not meant to be seen by anyone." The cast insisted she return and finish the film until she complied.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-03T12:47:00.000Z'), ('1466586609021861891', 'The Nick Swardson vehicle Bucky Larson: Born to Be a Star was completed in 2009, but it took two years for it to get a theatrical release due to being poorly received at test screenings, as well as its distributor Columbia Pictures having little to no faith in the film.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-12-03T01:54:30.000Z'), ('1465467989503926273', 'Bruce Joel Rubin also wrote a draft, with his version featuring the entire film turning out to be just a dream and ending with James waking up in bed. This too was rejected for deviating from the source material.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-29T23:49:30.000Z'), ('1465467762159980544', "Speaking of, the first writer hired to pen a script was Dennis Potter, whose draft deviated significantly from the book, being set in World War II, having James' mother die during the Blitzkrieg of London, and featuring his father ‚Äî a pilot ‚Äî turning out to be alive at the end.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-29T23:48:36.000Z'), ('1465467190086410246', 'Steven Spielberg and Danny DeVito were both interested in directing James and the Giant Peach before Henry Selick was hired.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-29T23:46:19.000Z'), ('1465313599770054664', 'Speaking of, Jonathan Dayton and Valerie Faris were also offered the chance to direct, but they turned it down in order to concentrate on making music videos instead.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-29T13:36:01.000Z'), ('1465312998214574083', 'Stacy Title was originally hired to direct the 1999 film adaptation of The Mod Squad but departed the project due to creative differences with MGM, who wanted a hipper product to market to teenagers, as opposed to Title, whose vision was much grittier.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-29T13:33:37.000Z'), ('1465052544871321603', "Steven Spielberg was once set to direct a Braveheart-style Moses biopic for Warner Bros. titled Gods and Kings. When he left, Ang Lee was looked at replace him. The project was ultimately cancelled while 20th Century Fox's competing film, Ridley Scott's Exodus, got made instead.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-28T20:18:40.000Z'), ('1464741764632301576', 'Speaking of, the fast-tracking close-ups of the dice in the gambling sequences were filmed by Michael Bay, who served as uncredited second unit consultant. In addition to then working with cinematographer Howard Atherton on Bad Boys, he would remake the same shots in Armageddon.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-27T23:43:44.000Z'), ('1464740588159385613', 'The erotic thriller Indecent Proposal was originally conceived as a vehicle for Tom Cruise and Nicole Kidman, with Warren Beatty looked at for the role that would eventually go to Robert Redford.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-27T23:39:04.000Z'), ('1464739622534197252', "Producer Michael Bay had such a hands-on approach to last year's pandemic thriller Songbird that he even went so far as to direct the film's action sequences.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-27T23:35:14.000Z'), ('1464053246885081090', 'Madonna\'s acting coach quit just before production on Body of Evidence began, claiming that "she thinks she knows everything."', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-26T02:07:49.000Z'), ('1463542092618252293', 'Adam Sandler originally tried to get Eddie Murphy for the role of Dr. Buddy Rydell in Anger Management. Steve Martin, Robert De Niro, Bill Murray, and Dustin Hoffman were also considered for the role. Ultimately, Jack Nicholson was cast.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-24T16:16:40.000Z'), ('1463528704647348228', "Dutch filmmaker Jean van de Velde was originally offered to direct Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo, but he turned it down after reading the script, having found it to be tasteless. He also felt that it was really Rob Schneider's film and he would have very little artistic control.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-24T15:23:28.000Z'), ('1463525114499280905', "Kattan also noted in his 2019 autobiography Baby Don't Hurt Me that Richard LaGravenese and Paul Thomas Anderson each assisted with rewriting the script but received no official credit. Saturday Night Live writers Matt Piedmont and Scott Wainio also contributed to the rewrites.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-24T15:09:12.000Z'), ('1463524870789210124', "...producer Robert Simonds ordered all the footage that had been assembled at that time to be reshot. Because of the tight budget, reshoots couldn't be done separately and had to be incorporated into the rest of the shoot, and Simonds insisted that Kattan act more cartoonishly.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-24T15:08:14.000Z'), ('1463524677909889032', "Speaking of, the film's star Chris Kattan originally portrayed the titular role more realistically and less like a caricature. But after Disney executive Peter Schneider fell asleep while watching the first rough ensemble of footage shot during the first three weeks of filming...", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-24T15:07:28.000Z'), ('1463524385839583235', "According to writers David Garrett and Jason Ward on an episode of the podcast Selling Your Screenplay, the only reason Corky Romano got greenlit was due to a pending actor's strike in September 2000, so the film was written in 10 days in May, shot in June, and wrapped in August.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-24T15:06:19.000Z'), ('1463349550236803074', 'In an interview with Howard Stern, Adam Sandler said he specifically cast David Spade and Rob Schneider in The Benchwarmers to force them to work together in order to smooth over a rift that the two had with each other.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-24T03:31:35.000Z'), ('1463002306790805511', 'Raja Gosnell was originally attached to direct the Adam Sandler comedy Big Daddy, but a deal was never concluded, so he was replaced with Dennis Dugan.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-23T04:31:45.000Z'), ('1462566024465821701', 'Aaron Eckhart once encountered a fan buying a copy of The Core at a video store and attempted to talk them into spending their money on something else.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-21T23:38:08.000Z'), ('1462453943682875399', 'Alan Silvestri was originally attached to score the Adam Sandler comedy Click, but he left the project in March 2006 due to creative differences. Silvestri was replaced with Rupert Gregson-Williams, who would become the go-to composer for Happy Madison productions.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-21T16:12:45.000Z'), ('1459506221975842817', 'Writer-producer John Hughes originally offered the script for Reach the Rock to director Chris Columbus at the same time he offered him the script for Home Alone. Columbus opted to direct the latter script instead, having found it funnier and especially liked the Christmas theme.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-13T12:59:34.000Z'), ('1459259518580371456', 'It was initially rumored that Will Ferrell and Melissa McCarthy were looked at to star in Home Sweet Home Alone before Rob Delaney and Ellie Kemper were cast.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-12T20:39:15.000Z'), ('1457287584812568579', 'Craig Brewer, Peter Berg, and John Singleton were considered to direct Straight Outta Compton before F. Gary Gray was hired.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-07T10:03:29.000Z'), ('1457060999643738122', 'D\'Arienzo was relatively dismissive of what he\'s seen from the finished product: "What\'s clear to me [from the] the parts I\'ve watched is that there feels like an underlying disdain ‚Äî or at best, dismissive sense ‚Äî of the era and the music."', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-06T19:03:07.000Z'), ('1457060346762567684', "However, D'Arienzo was booted off the project and replaced with Adam Shankman because New Line Cinema didn't trust him with a big budget. They then brought on other writers ‚Äî including Justin Theroux, Allan Loeb, Jordan Roberts, and Michael Arndt ‚Äî to heavily rewrite the script.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-06T19:00:32.000Z'), ('1457059969652695044', "Chris D'Arienzo was initially attached to write and direct Rock of Ages, having done the original stage show, and his pitch was to visually send-up older movie musicals, with his first draft including homages and tributes to Singin' in the Rain and the works of Busby Berkeley.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-06T18:59:02.000Z'), ('1456970338584174596', 'During filming on Total Recall, all the crew ‚Äî minus Arnold Schwarzenegger and Ronald Shusett ‚Äî got food poisoning. Paul Verhoeven was so sick that he needed an ambulance nearby at all times. In between takes, paramedics administered fluids and meds so he could keep directing.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-06T13:02:52.000Z'), ('1456967680326516748', 'Roger Deakins has never shot a film with anamorphic lenses. When he shoots for 2.35:1, he either shoots with Super 35 film stock or crops it in post. Blaustein and complained about being given minimal dialogue compared to the other actors. He opted to co-star in Aliens instead.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-03T17:47:27.000Z'), ('1455800519428083712', 'When Bobcat Goldthwait was given the script for Hot to Trot, he wrote "Why would I do this?" on the title page. His agent responded by drawing a dollar sign over it. The film bombed.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-03T07:34:25.000Z'), ('1455289849091592193', "For his role as Mr. Kreeg in Trick 'r Treat, one of the reasons why Brian Cox wore a wig and prosthetics for the part was because he wanted to look like John Carpenter.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-11-01T21:45:12.000Z'), ('1454054826996862986', "Jason Reitman was considered to direct Dude, Where's My Car? but he turned down the offer twice.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-10-29T11:57:40.000Z'), ('1454054097821356039', "Adam Sandler was originally cast in Peter Berg's film Very Bad Things, but he dropped out at the last minute to make The Waterboy. The role he was set to play was filled in by Jeremy Piven.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-10-29T11:54:46.000Z'), ('1453885292692312067', "Years before starring in Josh Trank's Capone, Tom Hardy was set to star in another Al Capone biopic Cicero ‚Äî a trilogy of films detailing his rise to power and subsequent fall ‚Äî from director David Yates and writer Walon Green. Mackye Gruber agreed to write the script for Final Destination 2 in order to be allowed to direct The Butterfly Effect, which was at the time one of the most widely read unproduced scripts in the industry.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-10-23T03:37:00.000Z'), ('1451753434877661185', 'Ronny Yu was originally attached to direct Snakes on a Plane, speaking enthusiastically about the project, but following budget disputes and creative differences, he bowed out and was replaced with David R. Ellis.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-10-23T03:32:45.000Z'), ('1451752559190888449', "To make it even worse, at a party celebrating the film's release, one of the film's stars ‚Äî Klaus Kinski ‚Äî boasted about how he and other members of the cast and crew had ganged up on Hooper to get him replaced.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-10-23T03:29:17.000Z'), ('1451752240805564417', 'Tobe Hooper was originally hired to direct the 1981 thriller Venom, but ten days into filming, he quit ‚Äî along with cinematographer Anthony B. Richmond ‚Äî due to creative differences. Diamond explained that he felt so badly about not being able to pull off the scene that he asked his band to play something that would make him angry. Fleischer quickly shouted "Action!" and Diamond burst into the recording booth in an absolute fury, successfully pulling off the scene. After shouting "Cut!", Fleischer asked Diamond... (2/?)', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-10-06T23:15:47.000Z'), ('1445890374204002305', 'During filming on the remake of The Jazz Singer, Neil Diamond was having trouble with a scene where his character storms into a recording booth in a rage and has a heated argument with another character. During a break, director Richard Fleischer looked into the glass of... (1/?)', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-10-06T23:15:03.000Z'), ('1445854302556196871', 'Sleepaway Camp 2 and 3 were shot back-to-back over a six-week period. The script for 3 was being written while 2 was still filming, leaving director Michael A. Simpson and the crew with only one weekend of pre-production before wrapping 2 and beginning principal photography on 3.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-10-06T20:51:43.000Z'), ('1445846722308153345', 'Rob Zombie was once considered to direct the 2003 remake of The Texas Chain Saw Massacre, but he immediately turned it down: "I actually got a call from my agent and they asked me if I wanted to be involved[...] I said, \'No fucking way\'!"', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-10-06T20:21:35.000Z'), ('1445845463022718977', 'Speaking of, while filming Cabin Fever, Roth played the Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen film Holiday in the Sun on a continuous loop in a screening room to give the cast and crew "artistic inspiration."', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-10-06T20:16:35.000Z'), ('1445844726276628482', "Eli Roth was the inspiration for the character of Eli in the 2004 teen sex comedy The Girl Next Door. While DiCaprio liked the script, he had to turn the role down because he had already signed on to star in Titanic.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-10-02T23:17:32.000Z'), ('1443252613949136903', 'The singer Prince was originally chosen for the role of the cat Prince in Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties, but he opted out of the role at the last minute, and so the filmmakers had to scrap all of the animation and start over with Tim Curry, who was their second choice.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-09-29T16:33:32.000Z'), ('1441479748220112897', "In early drafts of the script for Face/Off, Sean Archer went to the home of Castor Troy's mother to hide out. Writers Michael Colleary and Mike Werb wanted the mother to be played either by Elizabeth Taylor or by Jack Nicholson in drag.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-09-24T19:08:48.000Z'), ('1441256829044998150', 'Furthermore, when Scott signed on to direct, he was already attached to Enemy of the State, so he decided to use The Fan as a guinea pig to experiment with new visual styles and ideas that he wanted to bring to his future film.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-09-24T04:22:59.000Z'), ('1441256620202205191', 'Tony Scott initially turned down the offer to direct The Fan twice, as he disliked the script and had no interest in baseball.
