Russell.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-09-18T13:48:51.000Z'), ('1437734733287460869', 'Jason Alexander was originally attached to play Sam Weinberg in A Few Good Men, but when Seinfeld was unexpectedly renewed, he was no longer available. Kevin Pollak was cast in the part instead.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-09-14T11:07:26.000Z'), ('1437175150114451460', "Ryuichi Sakamoto was Brian De Palma's first choice to score Mission: Impossible, but he was too busy and ultimately declined. Alan Silvestri was then hired to do the score, but during post-production, Tom Cruise rejected his music and replaced him with Danny Elfman.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-09-12T22:03:51.000Z'), ('1437173586847051781', "James Horner was the original choice to score Tobe Hooper's Lifeforce, but he was unavailable. Michael Kamen was also asked to do the score, but he turned it down because he was too busy working on Terry Gilliam's Brazil. Ultimately, Henry Mancini was hired.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-09-12T21:57:39.000Z'), ('1437171291371544580', "Hans Zimmer was the original composer hired to do the score for Full Metal Jacket, but he was fired by director Stanley Kubrick and his music ultimately went unused. Zimmer was replaced with Kubrick's daughter Vivian.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-09-12T21:48:31.000Z'), ('1437146339398365190', "Miramax's original idea for following up Halloween: H20 was to do an entry without Michael Myers a la Season of the Witch, but Moustapha Akkad was staunchly opposed to this and put a stop to it by holding an online poll, whose results proved that fans wanted Michael to return.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-09-12T20:09:22.000Z'), ('1436375281049161730', "Jet Li was originally offered the role of Seraph in The Matrix Reloaded, but he turned it down as he didn't want his martial arts moves digitally recorded.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-09-10T17:05:28.000Z'), ('1436160127002943491', 'Paramount originally wanted Gilda Radner to play Olive Oyl in Popeye, but director Robert Altman threatened to leave the project unless Shelley Duvall was cast.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-09-10T02:50:31.000Z'), ('1435739229028601856', 'The Last Samurai was inspired by a project developed by director Vincent Ward. Ward became an executive producer, working in development on it for nearly four years and approaching directors Francis Ford Coppola and Peter Weir, before he eventually was interested in Edward Zwick.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-09-08T22:58:01.000Z'), ('1434835991517347842', 'Suburban Commando was originally intended as a vehicle for Arnold Schwarzenegger and Danny DeVito, but when the two opted to star in Twins instead, New Line Cinema bought the script as a vehicle for Hulk Hogan following the commercial success of No Holds Barred.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-09-06T11:08:52.000Z'), ('1434564874231820292', "Co-writer Simon Pegg revealed in a press conference that the character of Jaylah in Star Trek Beyond was named after Jennifer Lawrence and inspired by her performance in her breakout film Winter's Bone.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-09-05T17:11:33.000Z'), ('1434564028521660416', 'Speaking of, while Carol Marcus\' underwear scene was criticized as being "gratuitous," Alice Eve defended it, stating that she was proud to show her figure after working out intensely and maintaining that doing the scene wasn\'t forced upon her and that she didn\'t feel exploited.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-09-05T17:08:11.000Z'), ('1434562945468469255', "Edgar Wright has said that he directed a single shot during the scene featuring the Klingons on Kronos in Star Trek Into Darkness, though he isn't credited.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-09-05T17:03:53.000Z'), ('1434560237411962885', "In 1993, Nickelodeon signed a two-year contract with 20th Century FOX to produce feature films. However, Nickelodeon's parent company Viacom's acquisition of Paramount the following year put a stop to that.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-09-05T16:53:08.000Z'), ('1434193795743199235', 'LaKeith Stanfield was first considered for the role of Anthony McCoy in Candyman, but he turned it down to star in Judas and the Black Messiah.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-09-04T16:37:01.000Z'), ('1433269602587447296', 'Speaking of, a sequence was shot where Zelda Rubinstein reprises her role from Poltergeist and is shot out of a chimney, but it was cut out.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-09-02T03:24:36.000Z'), ('1433269026113953793', "It's implicit in the mirror scene in the 1995 Casper film that the three cameos (Clint Eastwood, Rodney Dangerfield, and Mel Gibson) match the respective personalities of each ghost uncle when they were alive (Stretch, Fatso, and Stinkie).", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-09-02T03:22:19.000Z'), ('1432815436853399560', 'Director Ivan Reitman initially conceived Stripes as a Cheech & Chong vehicle. While their manager thought the script was funny, the duo wanted complete creative control, so Reitman told writers Len Blum and Dan Goldberg to retool it for Bill Murray and Harold Ramis.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-08-31T21:19:55.000Z'), ('1432152818358571015', 'Speaking of, when Edgar Wright was still attached to direct, Patrick Wilson was cast as Paxton ‚Äî before eventually being replaced with Bobby Cannavale ‚Äî and Jordan Peele was also part of the cast.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-08-30T01:26:54.000Z'), ('1432152001492705282', 'Jessica Chastain was considered for the role of Hope van Dyne in Ant-Man, but she turned it down due to scheduling conflicts. She previously bowed out of the role of Maya Hansen in Iron Man 3 for the same reason.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-08-30T01:23:39.000Z'), ('1432150374882979851', "For Spider-Man 2, Raimi wanted to maintain the first film's 1.85:1 aspect ratio, but he upgraded to 2.35:1 when he realized that in order to have Doctor Octopus and Spider-Man in the same shot, the frame would need to be wider in order to accommodate Doc Ock's mechanical arms.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-08-30T01:17:12.000Z'), ('1432149528115884036', "For the first Spider-Man film, before Don Burgess was hired as the DP, director Sam Raimi initially wanted Bill Pope for the job, but he was too busy working on the Matrix sequels. Raimi's second choice was Peter Deming, but he was too busy working on Austin Powers in Goldmember.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-08-30T01:13:50.000Z'), ('1431728520296902656', "The film's writer Russell Gewirtz was resolute that his original script was every bit as good as his previous work Inside Man, if not better, and ultimately blamed director Jon Avnet for the film's failure: https://t.co/XqOStJZYuo", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-08-28T21:20:54.000Z'), ('1431728367557124099', 'The initial cut of the 2008 crime thriller Righteous Kill was two hours long, but after poor test screenings, Millennium Films hastily recut the film down to 101 minutes to quicken the pace and make it appear more action-oriented. The end result was a critical and financial bomb.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-08-28T21:20:17.000Z'), ('1431461613098438657', 'Speaking of, before Malkovich was cast as Cyrus "The Virus" Grissom, other actors who auditioned for the role included Willem Dafoe, Jason Isaacs, and Mickey Rourke. Goyer originally wanted to use Morbius as the villain for Blade II, but Marvel decided they wanted to retain the rights to the character, so Goyer changed the story slightly and replaced Morbius with an original character: Jared Nomak.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-08-27T01:49:39.000Z'), ('1430999450114215937', "In the early 2010's, Guillermo del Toro was developing a Hulk TV series for ABC as part of the MCU. Young Frankenstein was instead lensed by Gerald Hirschfeld.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-07-12T06:23:18.000Z'), ('1414377790170968065', "In late 2014/early 2015, rumor had it that Jesse Eisenberg's Lex Luthor would be the driving force behind the main premise for David Ayer's Suicide Squad, with Luthor being involved in metahuman trafficking and obtaining June Moone/Enchantress.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-07-12T00:15:17.000Z'), ('1413289260967505921', "Easy A writer Bert V. Pakula, Brian Levant, Jon Avnet, and Richard Linklater were attached to helm Friday Night Lights at various stages in development before Peter Berg was hired to rewrite and direct.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-06-17T22:41:02.000Z'), ('1405410090329509889', "The final scene in My Blueberry Nights, where Jeremy (Jude Law) kisses Elizabeth (Norah Jones) in the caf√©, took about 150 takes. Richmond left alongside Medak and was replaced with Jan de Bont.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-05-15T22:50:58.000Z'), ('1393699412157812736', "Haskell Wexler was originally scheduled to serve as cinematographer on The Last Detail, with Michael Chapman as the camera operator. Fraker originally served as cinematographer on The Deer Hunter, but he was eventually replaced with Vilmos Zsigmond during filming.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-05-15T22:43:49.000Z'), ('1393696342875246595', "Maryse Alberti was originally announced to serve as cinematographer on the Wachowskis' segments for Cloud Atlas, but she was ultimately replaced with John Toll.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-05-15T22:34:36.000Z'), ('1392686035964997632', 'David Fincher was originally attached to direct Catch Me If You Can but eventually dropped out in favor of helming Panic Room instead.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-05-13T03:40:00.000Z'), ('1392361105985400834', "Paul Giamatti was originally slated to play Vaughn Stickles in John Waters' last film A Dirty Shame, but due to committing to Sideways, he dropped out of the project and was replaced with Chris Isaak.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-05-12T06:08:51.000Z'), ('1391524861839921153', 'Speaking of, Sam Raimi was the original choice to direct, based on the success of Evil Dead II. William Fichtner was considered for Pinhead.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-05-05T04:07:08.000Z'), ('1389793383363878913', "When Christian E. Christiansen was attached, the teen-oriented PG-13 idea was going to stick ‚Äî what with Christiansen having recently wrapped the PG-13 thriller The Roommate for Sony ‚Äî and Amber Heard was being looked at for the lead. Alas, this version wasn't to be.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-05-05T04:05:38.000Z'), ('1389792784559886340', 'The common reason why they eventually left the project was because most of them wanted to make a serious R-rated film whereas the Weinsteins wanted it to be more a commercial PG-13 film in order to appeal to teenagers.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-05-05T04:03:15.000Z'), ('1389792301896146948', 'These filmmakers include Julien Maury & Alexandre Bustillo, Anthony DiBlasi, Patrick Melton & Marcus Dunstan, Pascal Laugier, Christian E. Christiansen, Todd Farmer & Patrick Lussier, and even series creator Clive Barker.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-05-05T04:01:20.000Z'), ('1389792044508487682', 'Before The Weinstein Company and Dimension Films lost the rights to the Hellraiser franchise to Miramax, they had been trying to get a reboot of the franchise off the ground since 2006, with numerous writers and directors going back and forth on the project.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-05-05T04:00:19.000Z'), ('1389690967163379713', "A twist they conceived was that Laurie Strode's biological father would be revealed to be Sheriff Leigh Brackett, making her the result of an extramarital affair he had with Michael's mother Deborah.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-05-04T21:18:40.000Z'), ('1389690709008080896', "When Julien Maury and Alexandre Bustillo were attached to write and direct Halloween II in 2008, their take was to be a prequel/sequel hybrid, with the prequel half focusing on Michael's teen years in Smith's Grove and the sequel half picking up where its predecessor left off.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-05-04T21:17:38.000Z'), ('1389111771529629698', 'On the commentary track for Sin City, director Robert Rodriguez revealed that in the late 1990\'s, he was attached to helm a Michael Mann-produced re-adaptation of Mickey Spillane\'s Kiss Me Deadly, but he left the project because he thought it was "too nostalgic."', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-05-03T06:57:09.000Z'), ('1389074932198432768', 'The earliest take, the one that was to be produced by Peters (with a script penned by Joe Ballarini), was to be less of a horror film and more of a fantasy comedy along the lines of Ghostbusters and Men in Black.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-05-03T04:30:46.000Z'), ('1389074471856844800', "The version that came to closest to making progress ‚Äî before news petered out and the project eventually quietly died ‚Äî was Simon West's take, which would've starred Samuel L. Jackson and Halle Berry and utilized CGI to bring the titular creature to life.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-05-03T04:28:56.000Z'), ('1389074017798213635', 'A second remake of The Blob has been trying to get off the ground for twenty years, with numerous writers, producers, and directors ‚Äî including Jon Peters, Scott Rudin, Chad and Carey Hayes, Rob Zombie, James Wan, Scott Kosar, and Simon West ‚Äî going back and forth on the project.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-05-03T04:27:08.000Z'), ('1388630105459761153', "In the initial draft of the screenplay for Joker, the scene in Arthur's apartment where he puts on the Joker make-up was set to Elton John's Bennie and the Jets.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-05-01T23:03:11.000Z'), ('1387915596206116864', 'Deakins was also the original director of photography on the biographical historical drama Rob Roy, but several weeks into filming, he was replaced with Karl Walter Lindenlaub.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-04-29T23:43:59.000Z'), ('1387915278441406467', 'Roger Deakins was the original director of photography on Thirteen Days, but due to creative differences, he left production and was replaced with Andrzej Bartkowiak.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-04-29T23:42:43.000Z'), ('1387531690319532032', 'On a routine visit, Steven Spielberg spent a day on the set of The Wolf of Wall Street, watching the filming of the Steve Madden speech. Director Martin Scorsese claims that Spielberg essentially co-directed the scene, giving advice to the actors and suggesting camera angles.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-04-28T22:18:28.000Z'), ('1387454893833789446', 'Wes Craven presented a pitch for A Nightmare on Elm Street 4 about time travel within dreams that broke all the rules of dreams, but producer Sara Risher turned it down for being "too illogical."', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-04-28T17:13:19.000Z'), ('1384982482685239298', 'For the film In Cold Blood, Columbia Pictures originally wanted Paul Newman and Steve McQueen to star as Richard Hickock and Perry Smith, respectively, but director Richard Brooks refused as he felt their star statuses would render their performances less believable to audiences.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-04-21T21:28:50.000Z'), ('1384180783703683083', 'Brian Levant was originally chosen to direct Junior, but Arnold Schwarzenegger refused to star in the film unless Ivan Reitman directed it.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-04-19T16:23:10.000Z'), ('1383516905550450692', 'Greg Mottola was the original director hired to helm Duplex, but shortly before filming was to begin, he was fired from the project by the Weinsteins. Danny DeVito was brought in to take over at the last minute.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-04-17T20:25:09.000Z'), ('1382152114231721985', 'The Devil Inside was originally scripted as a traditional film, but writers William Brent Bell and Matthew Peterman got frustrated with the process. After a suggestion from producer Morris Paulson, they rewrote the script into a found-footage/mockumentary hybrid film.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-04-14T02:01:57.000Z'), ('1381848988886962178', "Chunk's fake-vomit movie-theater prank confessed in The Goonies was based on an actual prank that executive producer Steven Spielberg pulled in his youth.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-04-13T05:57:27.000Z'), ('1380732085128855555', "Steven Spielberg was originally attached to direct the English-language version of Oldboy with Will Smith starring. Warner Bros. begged Seagal to trim it, and after audiences booed and laughed at test screenings, he relented and cut the scene down to 7 minutes.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-04-02T17:38:52.000Z'), ('1377719599328866306', 'The digits scrolling down the screen in The Matrix were actually symbols from a sushi cookbook scanned by production designer Owen Paterson.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-04-01T20:28:43.000Z'), ('1377718705887584262', 'The noises made by the Velociraptors in Jurassic Park were sourced from recordings of tortoises mating. The Coens had to wait for it to dissipate before they could get back to shooting.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-04-01T20:23:36.000Z'), ('1377691017214853128', 'O.J. Simpson was considered for the role of he T-800 in The Terminator but director James Cameron rejected the choice because he felt that Simpson was too likable, goofy, and innocent to convincing play the part.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-04-01T18:35:09.000Z'), ('1377678841720795140', 'According to Keenen Ivory Wayans, on one instance during filming on The Glimmer Man, when Steven Seagal showed up late on set, Seagal appeared with a screenplay that he called the greatest script he ever read in his life. When Wayans asked him who wrote it, Seagal said, "I did."', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-04-01T17:46:46.000Z'), ('1377674132226248705', 'According to John Leguizamo in his autobiography, his frequent improvisation on the set of Executive Decision angered Kurt Russell so much that they got into a shoving match.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-04-01T17:28:03.000Z'), ('1377672945468899336', 'During post-production on Under Siege 2: Dark Territory, producer and star Steven Seagal was in the cutting room for the editing process, vetting takes, causing friction between himself, director Geoff Murphy, and editor Michael Tronick.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-04-01T17:23:20.000Z'), ('1377471393177206787', "James Rolfe was offered the lead role in Adam Wingard's segment for V/H/S/2, but he declined due to working on Angry Video Game Nerd: The Movie. Rolfe was later offered to make a cameo appearance in Godzilla vs. Kong, but he had to decline due to the birth of his second daughter.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-04-01T04:02:26.000Z'), ('1377427852837089281', 'In 2004, Warner Bros. considered developing the Green Lantern film as a comedy, with Jack Black starring and Robert Smigel penning the script. However, the idea was quickly dropped following fan backlash on the Internet.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-04-01T01:09:26.000Z'), ('1377424336269680642', 'The original cut of Inspector Gadget was 110 minutes long, but after disastrous test screenings, it was cut down to 78 minutes for its theatrical release.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-04-01T00:55:27.000Z'), ('1377102239139950598', 'Director Tim Burton was sick pretty much every day working on Batman.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-03-31T03:35:33.000Z'), ('1377100883972947968', 'According to William Forsythe, on the set of Out for Justice, Steven Seagal told him, "You really need to work on your Brooklyn accent." Forsythe ‚Äî a Brooklyn native ‚Äî replied with, "Trust me, *you* do."', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-03-31T03:30:10.000Z'), ('1376775493060558848', "Of the twenty women in the room, eighteen had experience with rape ‚Äî either they, or someone they knew, had been raped. When tested again months later, it was given one of the highest scores in the studio's history.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-03-30T05:57:11.000Z'), ('1376775454581997571', 'Studio executives wanted to put the film on the shelf and were looking for ways to prevent it from being released. Lansing asked for another screening with just women, which was far more successful.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-03-30T05:57:02.000Z'), ('1376775310264430597', 'Following early test screenings of The Accused, the film received the lowest scores in the history of Paramount Pictures. According to producer Sherry Lansing, "The audience thought that Jodie [Foster]\'s character deserved the rape."', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-03-30T05:56:27.000Z'), ('1376696887189909507', 'Paul Hirsch was offered to serve as film editor on Joel Schumacher\'s The Lost Boys, but he turned the job down because he found vampire films to be the "stupidest of all genres" and hoped never to work on one.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-03-30T00:44:50.000Z'), ('1376694902537523210', 'Murphy ultimately financed many of the reshoots while the film languished in post-production, taking over for Underwood as an uncredited director and writing the new scenes along with his go-to writers Barry W. Blaustein and David Sheffield.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-03-30T00:36:57.000Z'), ('1376694706713853957', 'The original workprint ran nearly three hours, and editor Alan Heim was hired to fix the film. After viewing the footage, he determined that a large portion of the film needed to be reshot and that a new opening, a new ending, and new intros for the protagonists be added.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-03-30T00:36:10.000Z'), ('1376693757874216965', 'However, principal photography was hampered by constant bickering among star Eddie Murphy, director Ron Underwood, and the producers, with Murphy often overruling Underwood and making on-the-fly rewrites, causing the film to go over-schedule and over-budget.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-03-30T00:32:24.000Z'), ('1376693585756745732', 'Neil Cuthbert first wrote the script for The Adventures of Pluto Nash back in 1985, but it was passed on to numerous uncredited writers (including Kevin Wade, Andrew and Adam Scheinman, Roger Kumble, and co-producer Michael Scott Bregman) before filming finally began in 2000.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-03-30T00:31:43.000Z'), ('1376052067308015617', "Larry Cohen first pitched Phone Booth to Alfred Hitchcock in the 1960's. Hitchcock liked it, but they couldn't figure out a good reason for keeping it confined to a booth. '2021-03-23T03:50:03.000Z'), ('1374205899821232128', 'Johnny Depp, Tilda Swinton, Richard Armitage, Tom Hiddleston, Jackie Earle Haley, Jim Carrey, Kirk Acevedo, Willem Dafoe, Paul Giamatti, Hugo ('1374096235909554181', 'According to an interview for Secret Handshake with writer-director David Prior, when Disney screened The Empty Man, they hated it and tried to cut it down to 90 minutes, but Night Shyamalan's unrealized projects is a supernatural thriller titled The Connected. Night Shyamalan was in talks with Philip Seymour Hoffman for an unspecified role in Lady in the Water. David Newman wrote the script, and the plan was for it to be live-action with actors in costumes and prosthetics, inspired by The Wizard of Oz.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-03-03T07:27:49.000Z'), ('1363747685040291840', "John Cassavetes didn't originally intend to direct his screenplay for Gloria; he planned merely to sell the story to Columbia Pictures. However, once his wife Gena Rowlands was asked to play the title character, she asked Cassavetes to direct it.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-02-22T07:09:19.000Z'), ('1358956357362323457', "Shia LaBeouf and Jonah Hill were considered for the lead in Sia's autism stereotype-perpetuating Music before Kate Hudson was cast.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-02-09T01:50:18.000Z'), ('1358344028652269568', 'On the set of Mikey and Nicky, Peter Falk was convinced that Ned Beatty was the brother of Warren Beatty. However, this version never got made.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-02-07T05:33:24.000Z'), ('1356497792840196096', 'On the audio commentary for The Ward, co-star Jared Harris asked director John Carpenter why he didn\'t compose the score, to which Carpenter replied, "Quite frankly, I\'m just too old."', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-02-02T07:00:50.000Z'), ('1356004731748020225', "For his portrayal of Aquaman, Jason Momoa took inspiration from Clint Eastwood's performance in The Outlaw Josey Wales.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-01-31T22:21:36.000Z'), ('1356003374655819781', "Matt Damon, Bradley Cooper, Joaquin Phoenix, Adam Driver, and Jean Dujardin were also on the studio's list to play Luthor before Eisenberg was cast.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-01-31T22:16:12.000Z'), ('1356003104030912514', "Speaking of, according to Tao Okamoto, Jesse Eisenberg changed several of his lines, causing some of the actors' reactions to be genuine.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-01-31T22:15:07.000Z'), ('1356002927467524099', 'Warner Bros. initially wanted Tom Hanks for the role of Lex Luthor in Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice based on his performance in Cloud Atlas.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-01-31T22:14:25.000Z'), ('1356001568210956289', 'Speaking of, James Newton Howard turned down the opportunity to reteam with Hans Zimmer on the score, feeling that due to the collaboration between Nolan and Zimmer on Inception, he would be like a third wheel.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-01-31T22:09:01.000Z'), ('1356000912096026633', 'Director Christopher Nolan once considered using a mixture of CGI and deleted scenes from The Dark Knight to have The Joker appear briefly in The Dark Knight. He ultimately decided against it, feeling that it was disrespectful to Heath Ledger.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-01-31T22:06:25.000Z'), ('1354202658035429379', 'Jon Voight reportedly based the role of Kane in Superbabies: Baby Geniuses 2 on descriptions of Josef Mengele, the infamous Nazi doctor that performed grotesque experiments on prisoners in concentration camps.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-01-26T23:00:48.000Z'), ('1353929304896368641', "When John Carpenter was attached to helm Firestarter (his version would've seen him directing from a script by Bill Lancaster and rewritten by Bill Phillips), he wanted Richard Dreyfuss for the role of Andy McGee and reportedly talked to Darwin Joston about playing John Rainbird.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-01-26T04:54:35.000Z'), ('1352997469441961984', 'According to Jon Lovitz, writer-director George Gallo did not actually direct much on Trapped in Paradise and told the cast to do whatever they wanted, and Nicolas Cage actually directed some of the film because Gallo refused to give direction.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-01-23T15:11:48.000Z'), ('1352688630440091649', 'The Wayans Bros. comedy White Chicks was originally titled The Miltons (a reference to the Hiltons) and initially intended to be a comical remake of Gone with the Wind in modern-day Beverly Hills.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-01-22T18:44:35.000Z'), ('1352681550543024129', "The Vanishing helmer George Sluizer was the original director attached to Rob Schneider's pet project The Chosen One, but he left during production. Due to Farley's untimely death, production plans were halted and the project was shelved for well over a decade.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-01-08T05:48:38.000Z'), ('1347415795333292032', 'Speaking of, a rejected draft of the screenplay was penned by Truman Capote, whose version had Nick Carraway be a gay man and Jordan Baker be a vindictive lesbian.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-01-08T05:32:14.000Z'), ('1347415566240391170', 'Robert Towne was offered a chance to write the screenplay for the 1974 film adaptation of The Great Gatsby, but despite a $175,000 salary, he turned it down: "I didn\'t want to be the unknown Hollywood screenwriter who fucked up a literary classic."', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-01-08T05:31:19.000Z'), ('1346977621041672194', 'The Wachowskis-scripted Assassins was initially set to be directed by Joe Johnston and star Sean Connery and Wesley Snipes, prior to the hiring of Richard Donner, Sylvester Stallone, and Antonio Banderas respectively.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-01-07T00:31:05.000Z'), ('1346542299015237632', "Prior to Anthony and Joe Russo's production company AGBO purchasing the rights to Cherry, an offer was made by Warner Bros., who intended it as a vehicle for James Franco to direct.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2021-01-05T19:41:16.000Z'), ('1346540389256159233', 'Natalie Portman, Scarlett Johansson, and Jennifer Lawrence were considered for Lisbeth Salander in The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo. Alison Brie, Rooney Mara, Olivia Wilde, Emma Watson, Lily Collins, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, and Evan Rachel Wood, etc. were also considered for the role.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-08-23T17:41:27.000Z'), ('1297588999394033672', "King Shark was originally going to appear in Suicide Squad, but he would only have been possible as a fully-CGI'd character, which writer-director David Ayer disliked. Clint Eastwood agreed to take over as director and star in exchange for Warner Bros. letting him make White Hunter Black Heart.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-08-20T20:08:25.000Z'), ('1296496457114165249', 'Home Alone was originally set up at Warner Bros. but was taken over by 20th Century FOX during production when the film went over-budget.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-08-20T17:16:57.000Z'), ('1296494264428433408', 'Brett Ratner had discussions about directing the Michael Bay-produced Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles reboot before Jonathan Liebesman was hired.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-08-20T17:08:14.000Z'), ('1296493403107196930', 'Ben Affleck, Darren Aronofsky Guillermo del Toro, Duncan Jones, Jonathan Liebesman, Matt Reeves, Tony Scott, and Robert Zemeckis were on the shortlist to direct Man of Steel before Zack Snyder was hired.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-08-20T17:04:49.000Z'), ('1296325133003640832', 'When Steven Spielberg was once attached to direct The Trial of the Chicago 7, he wanted Will Smith for the role of Bobby Seale and Heath Ledger for the role of Tom Hayden.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-08-20T05:56:10.000Z'), ('1295950978726977539', 'Brian De Palma, Greg McLean, Brad Anderson, and Akiva Goldsman were considered to direct Paranormal Activity 2 before Kevin Greutert was hired. Since he signed contract, he couldn't back out of the film and was forced to stay on.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-08-05T01:29:20.000Z'), ('1290821877938692097', "...have a say in the editing, and pick his co-star. Rooney Mara was considered to take over before Mila Kunis was cast.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-25T02:50:17.000Z'), ('1275981030571347973', "In the 1990's, Stanley Kubrick and Terry Southern wrote an unproduced script for a sequel to Dr. Strangelove set decades later in the mineshaft, which they planned to pitch to Terry Gilliam.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-25T02:35:58.000Z'), ('1275976666070818816', "In the mid-1990's, Ted Turner planned on producing a film version of Gilligan's Island which would've starred Adam Sandler as Gilligan and Chris Farley as The Skipper, but it never materialized.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-25T02:18:38.000Z'), ('1275976119611723778', 'Mick Jagger was originally slated to play Frank-N-Furter in The Rocky Horror Picture Show.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-25T02:16:28.000Z'), ('1275951393229156353', "Tropic Thunder was originally written with Keanu Reeves in mind to play Tugg Speedman, while co-writer/director Ben Stiller would play Rick Peck. Later, Owen Wilson was supposed to play Peck, but Matthew McConaughey was cast in the role following Wilson's suicide attempt in 2007.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-25T00:38:12.000Z'), ('1275950042982031361', 'Thomas and the Magic Railroad originally featured a human villain named P.T. Boomer, but he was cut out due to test audiences finding him too scary.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-25T00:32:50.000Z'), ('1275945415331000320', 'Paramount and Nickelodeon initially obtained the film rights to The Smurfs back in 2005, with the intent of making the film an epic comedic fantasy described as The Lord of the Rings meets The Princess Bride. They eventually lost the rights, which were then acquired by Sony.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-25T00:14:27.000Z'), ('1275944480596729856', 'When Sonic the Hedgehog was in development at Sony (prior to Paramount getting the rights), the studio wanted it to be a PG-13 film to cash in on the "dark and gritty" trend and to increase its chances of succeeding at the box office.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-25T00:10:44.000Z'), ('1275933720562864129', "Ridley Scott's Robin Hood was initially written as a murder mystery with the Sheriff as the protagonist and Robin as the villain. A subsequent rewrite had Robin and the Sheriff be the same person. Later rewrites dropped these ideas in favor of a more traditional Robin Hood story.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-24T23:27:59.000Z'), ('1275932104547852288', 'The remake of Red Dawn was originally written and shot to be about a Chinese invasion of America. Due to fears of the film being banned in China and losing money, the film was altered in post-production to instead be about a North Korean invasion of America. It bombed anyway.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-24T23:21:34.000Z'), ('1275931415784366089', 'My Stepmother is an Alien was initially scripted as a fairy tale-esque horror film dealing with child abuse, but at the behest of studio executives, it was heavily rewritten to be a silly comedy instead.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-24T23:18:49.000Z'), ('1275930582929879040', "Thor: The Dark World initially only had Loki in a small role and more scenes dedicated to character development for Malekith and the Dark Elves. However, because of Loki's popularity following The Avengers, his role was beefed up while Malekith's was drastically scaled down.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-24T23:15:31.000Z'), ('1275929611260645385', 'The infamous Gigli was initially scripted as a dark mob comedy, but studio executives forced writer-director Martin Brest to change it into a romantic comedy to cash in on the then-popular Bennifer (Ben Affleck and Jennifer Lopez) pairing at the time.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-24T23:11:39.000Z'), ('1275912084337971202', 'Christina Ricci was originally cast as Velma in Scooby-Doo before she was replaced by Linda Cardellini.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-24T22:02:00.000Z'), ('1275853411179692033', 'Speaking of Home Alone, Robert De Niro was initially approached to play Harry but he turned down the role.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-24T18:08:52.000Z'), ('1275852921217921026', 'Daniel Roebuck was originally cast as Marv in Home Alone, but the producers were cold towards him and he was told that he was no longer needed due to a lack of chemistry with Joe Pesci, even though filming had yet to begin.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-24T18:06:55.000Z'), ('1275847909188210689', 'James Cameron, who also wanted to make Jurassic Park, planned on buying the rights, but Universal and Steven Spielberg purchased them a mere few hours before he could. Upon seeing the finished film, Cameron admitted that Spielberg was the better choice to direct the film.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-24T17:47:00.000Z'), ('1275847461651742725', '20th Century FOX, Columbia Pictures, and Warner Bros. all bid for the rights to Jurassic Park before they were sold to Universal. FOX intended the film to be a directing vehicle for Joe Dante, Columbia planned it for Richard Donner, and Warner Bros. wanted it for Tim Burton.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-24T17:45:13.000Z'), ('1275845315376054272', 'Quentin Tarantino went to Constantin Film with a completed screenplay for a proposed Silver Surfer film after the success of Reservoir Dogs, but the studio passed on the script and turned down the project.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-24T17:36:41.000Z'), ('1275838036211757056', 'Robert Rodriguez, Danny Boyle, George A. Romero, and Sam Raimi were initially approached to direct Scream.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-24T17:07:46.000Z'), ('1275697775158624257', 'Dragonball: Evolution was in development at FOX as far back as 2002, with Tedi Sarafian initially hired to write a script and Roland Emmerich being looked at to direct.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-24T07:50:25.000Z'), ('1275669473274593282', "Paul Bettany was considered for the role of Javert in Tom Hooper's Les Mis√©rables before Russell Crowe was cast.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-24T05:57:57.000Z'), ('1275666710943674368', 'David Bowie was the original choice to play the Acid Queen in Tommy ‚Äî and Tiny Tim was also considered ‚Äî before Tina Turner was cast.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-24T05:46:59.000Z'), ('1275665478028058628', "Before Aerosmith was cast, KISS was first approached to play the Future Villain Band in Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band. However, they turned it down, instead opting to star in KISS Meets the Phantom of the Park.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-24T05:42:05.000Z'), ('1275663879708782592', 'Four of the nine writers who worked on Armageddon are Paul Attanasio, Ann Biderman, Scott Rosenberg, and Robert Towne, all of whom went uncredited for their contributions.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-24T05:35:44.000Z'), ('1275649840844767232', 'Among the numerous writers who contributed to Edge of Tomorrow but went uncredited are Dante Harper, Joby Harold, Tim Kring, Steve Kloves, Alex Kurtzman & Roberto Orci, and Simon Kinberg.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-24T04:39:57.000Z'), ('1275267543725457408', 'Tak Fujimoto served as second unit cinematographer on Star Wars: A New Hope.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-23T03:20:50.000Z'), ('1275247482646286339', 'Michael Fassbender once said that Joel Schumacher, with whom he worked on the film Blood Creek, was one of his favorite directors.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-23T02:01:07.000Z'), ('1275244753383305219', "Oliver Stone was initially attached to direct Mission: Impossible II and even wrote a treatment, but he backed out of the project due to scheduling conflicts resulting from Tom Cruise's prolonged stint on Eyes Wide Shut.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-23T01:50:16.000Z'), ('1275243575886983168', "For Planes, Trains & Automobiles, director John Hughes originally wanted Tom Hanks to pay Neal Page and John Travolta to pllay Del Griffith. However, Hanks was too busy filming Big and Paramount wasn't keen on Travolta starring as he was considered box office poison at the time.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-23T01:45:36.000Z'), ('1275243062768394245', 'The Family Man was initially developed as a John Travolta vehicle with the late Curtis Hanson directing, but Travolta passed on the project and Hanson left to helm Wonder Boys.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-23T01:43:33.000Z'), ('1275187480782868485', 'For the 1987 horror-thriller The Stepfather, screenwriter Donald E. Rousselot stayed on the film for one week of filming and eventually quit, calling Ratner a "jumped-up little Hollywood asshole."', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-21T21:11:13.000Z'), ('1274255263734861825', 'Jack Black was initially considered to star in Son of the Mask before Jamie Kennedy was cast.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-20T08:18:24.000Z'), ('1274245415144169472', "Director James DeMonaco originally scripted the daughter trying to kill the father in The Purge. Tony Scott, Alex Proyas, and Jonathan Mostow were then on the shortlist before Marc Forster was hired.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-19T16:24:49.000Z'), ('1273864532696465408', 'Michael Mann served as a producer on Hancock.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-19T06:25:46.000Z'), ('1273854796945149952', "Graeme Revell was the original composer for Wes Craven's The People Under the ('1273682567645016070', "In 2006, Christopher Nolan was attached to direct a film adaptation of the British television series The Prisoner, which he would've moved onto making after The Dark Knight, ('1273377926768201728', "Forest Whitaker was originally attached to direct 20th Century FOX's film adaptation of Fat Albert, but he departed due to creative differences with Bill Cosby.", Avildsen wanted the film to be an underdog love story, entirely disinterested in making it a moral tract.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-15T20:23:32.000Z'), ('1272614402609553409', 'Robert Rodriguez was approached to direct Deadpool back in 2010, and he considered taking the gig, having liked the script. Seltzer was ultimately given a writing credit in the finished film.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-15T18:13:20.000Z'), ('1272590213806727171', "Ian McEwan's original script for The Good Son was said to be much more subtle and complex, but director Joseph Ruben hired frequent collaborator David Loughery to perform uncredited rewrites that simplified the story, thus appealing more to his mainstream commercial instincts.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-15T18:02:05.000Z'), ('1272586113954217993', "When the film adaptation of The Crow was in initial development at Paramount, an executive suggested that it should be a musical starring Michael Jackson. (1/2)", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-15T16:19:04.000Z'), ('1272444854052835328', 'Directors such as Shawn Levy, Jay Russell, and Brian Robbins came and went on Fever Pitch from 2001 to 2003. Jack Green and his crew were hired to take over for the remainder of filming. (1/2)', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-15T07:26:38.000Z'), ('1272429398604623872', "Bruce Green was hired to edit Friday the 13th: Part V ‚Äì A New Beginning based on a recommendation from Michael Kahn, whom Green worked as an assistant editor to on the Indiana Jones films. (1/?)', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-15T06:46:30.000Z'), ('1272414778137468931', "One of the late Wes Craven's unrealized projects was an adaptation of Mary Shelley's Frankenstein for producer ('1272404266012094465', 'Jude Law was offered the role of General Zod in Superman Returns, but when he turned it down numerous times, disgraced director Bryan Singer ultimately removed the character ('1272398548106182657', "When Warner Bros. was unimpressed with Oliver Hirschbiegel's original darker, much slower cut of The Invasion, they ordered $10 million worth of reshoots ‚Äî written by Lana was ultimately removed from the film.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-15T04:57:10.000Z'), ('1272389578977140741', 'When Clint Eastwood was still attached to direct A Star is Born, Beyonc√© '2020-06-15T04:34:49.000Z'), ('1272363354896699392', "David Rosenbloom was the original editor on Molly's Game, but was fired by director Aaron Sorkin shortly after footage was shown at CinemaCon. His replacement was Steve Jobs editor Elliot Graham, who in turn also brought Alan Baumgarten and Josh Schaeffer onto the project.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-15T03:00:37.000Z'), ('1272358381748092930', 'Deschanel was also the original cinematographer on Titanic, hired mainly for his experience with lensing period films, but clashed with James Cameron over the lighting, with Cameron wanting to be involved as much as possible while Deschanel was more used to operating on his own.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-15T02:40:52.000Z'), ('1272357305330393088', "Caleb Deschanel was the original director of photography on DreamWorks' remake of The Haunting, but due to creative differences with director Jan de Bont, he parted ways after the first week of shooting and was replaced by Karl Walter Lindenlaub.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-15T02:36:35.000Z'), ('1272351380657840128', 'Harry Gregson-Williams was initially looked at to compose the musical score for The Amazing Spider-Man before James Horner was hired.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-15T02:13:02.000Z'), ('1272346807855730694', 'One of the many editors brought in to try and salvage Suicide Squad in post-production was Lee Smith, who had been nominated for an Academy Award for his work on The Dark Knight.', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-15T01:54:52.000Z'), ('1272340677624500226', "Dante Spinotti was originally hired to serve as director of photography on Tim Burton's Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street, but was eventually replaced by Dariusz Wolski.", 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-15T01:30:31.000Z'), ('1272340463283027968', 'Might as well create a whole series of tweets about movie trivia given how well my more recent posts about it are doing...\n\n...thread below:', 'DawsonEJoyce|2861352197', '2020-06-15T01:29:40.000Z')]

[('1532382156080697344', "@Fractious90 I can't tell if you're being sarcastic or not. üòÜ I just know it felt super complicated until I found out that the combo is meaningless (as long as you don't repeat one), and it's only the end that matters. Then it all clicked way easier.", 'DemosthenesHPW|1123768130873044994', '2022-06-02T15:22:30.000Z'), ('1532354281311031298', '@DemosthenesHPW Honestly...amazing explanation üòÇ mudras are why I haven‚Äôt given it too much of a try and that makes it sound way more manageable', 'Fractious90|1349476468045221889', '2022-06-02T13:31:45.000Z'), ('1532226527819087873', '@Fractious90 ...and then just Suitons and Raitons 95% of the time. :D', 'DemosthenesHPW|1123768130873044994', '2022-06-02T05:04:06.000Z'), ('1532226416598831104', "@Fractious90 ...your Kassatsu, which is the ONLY time you press something weird for them, which is ending with Jin on a two press. \n\nHeck, you actually don't even use Huton in combat unless you die or there's a LONG transition, put up Huton before the fight starts, hide to reset your mudras..", 'DemosthenesHPW|1123768130873044994', '2022-06-02T05:03:39.000Z'), ('1532226097450041344', '@Fractious90 Chi-Jin-Ten or Jin-Chi-Ten, either way Huton.
